Este será el crédito número 02 con MFP, está muy contenta de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá mas segura de avanzar con su negocio, por otro lado ella se compromete una vez mas a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de manera puntual ya que no desea quedar mal con su grupo ya que ahí son muy puntuales.
Con el monto solicitado 1000 soles, comprará mas cosméticos, prendas de vestir, accesorios de adornos para mujeres, así como utensilios de cocina como platos, ollas.
texts.en:
34-year-old Iris is a cheerful and enterprising woman. She lives with 44-year-old Royer and has two children, a 6-year-old and a 2-month-old baby. She owns a house of her own and lives next door to her family.
Iris owns a business consisting of selling clothing, shoes and products that she offers to her customers from a catalog. She owns a store which she shares with her father, who's her business partner. There she offers her merchandise. She also sells pots, plates, spoons and other items which she buys by wholesale in town and then takes to the neighboring areas for selling. She has been working for over 6 years and does it alone, because she believes that she does better that way.
She enjoys her work because she gets free time for many other activities. Besides, she has direct contact with people, since she's very friendly. She brings in innovative fashion articles and accessories and high quality clothing, and that's why she always has customers. In addition, the cosmetics she sells are very good and healing for her customers' skin. She hopes to someday set up a well-equipped store.
This will be her second loan with MFP. She's very glad to know that she'll get financial support, because that way she'll feel more secure in moving forward with her business. On the other hand, she once again pledges to make her repayments in a timely fashion since she doesn't want to look bad in her communal bank, because the members are very punctual.
With the requested amount of 1000 nuevos soles she'll purchase more cosmetics, garments and accessories for women, as well as kitchenware such as plates and pots.

loans.use: to purchase more cosmetics, garments and accessories for women, as well as kitchenware such as plates and pots.

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es: Doña Ana María es una clienta habitante de una comarca cercana a Managua, su esposo trabaja como gestor de cobro ambos tienen 4 hijos menores de 18 años todos estudian con el servicio de costura de doña Ana y el apoyo de su esposo hacen posible el buen desarrollo de sus hijos así como también con los ingresos de una mini librería que ha puesto hace dos años han podido salir adelante, ella está optando a un primer crédito para construir cuartos para que sus hijos tengan su propio espacio, necesitara comprar cemento, arena, bloques, hierro y pagar la mano de obra.
texts.en:
Ana María is a client who lives in an area close to Managua.  Her husband works as a collections manager.  Together they have four children under the age of 18, all of them students.

Ana's sewing business and the support of her husband facilitate the children's good development.  In addition, they've managed to get ahead with the income from a mini-bookstore she set up two years ago.

She's choosing to get her first loan to build rooms so her children have their own space.  She will need to buy cement, sand, cinder blocks, and rebar, and pay for labor.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, cinder blocks, and rebar, and to pay for labor

loans.name: Orlando De Jesus

texts.es:
El señor Orlando de Jesús vive en la comarca de San Ramón una comunidad ubicad a unos 5 km al sur del Municipio de Condega, un pueblo que esta a unos 35 km al norte de la ciudad de Estelí. Este señor reside ahí desde hace uno 15 años y esta felizmente casado y un hijo en edad infantil.
 
El señor Orlando de Jesus se dedica a la agricultura y la ganadería desde hace aproximadamente unos veinte años siendo esta su principal fuente de ingreso y sostén de su familia. El a diario viaja a su finca donde cuida su ganado y a la preparación de la tierra para la siembra de granos básicos para venta y consumo.


Orlando de Jesus se presento a las oficinas de Ceprodel con el objetivo de solicitar un nuevo financiamiento para preparar la tierra y la compra de semilla para lo que son las siembras de primera de granos básicos tales como maíz y frijoles, el necesita este financiamiento para el pago de la mano de obra y compra del insumo semilla ya que los ingresos de los agricultores dependen de la cosecha ósea que son anuales.

Este cliente ya ha tenido crédito en Ceprodel en 6 ciclos crediticios en total en un periodo de 4 años y se muestra agradecido por el apoyo que la institución, le ha ayudado a mejorar su producción y sus cosechas y por ende sus ingresos ya que el sector agrícola casi no se financia por ningún sector gubernamental
texts.en:
Orlando de Jesús lives in San Ramon region, a community located 5 km to the south of the Municipality of Condega, a town that is 35 km north of the city of Esteli. This man has been living there for 15 years and is happily married with one infant son.

Orlando de Jesus has worked in agriculture and ranching for about 20 years. This is the main source of income and support for his family. Each day he travels to his ranch, where he cares for his cattle and prepares the land for planting basic grains for sale and consumption.

This borrower came to the Ceprodel offices to request a new loan to prepare the land and purchase seeds for sowing basic grains such as corn and beans. He needs this loan to pay his hired help and purchase the seeds because the income from the agriculture comes from the harvest. That is to say, it comes annually.

This borrower has received credit from Ceprodel for six loan cycles over a period of four years. He is grateful for the help that this institution has given him to improve his production and his harvests, and, therefore, his income because the agricultural sector almost never receives governmental loans.

loans.use: prepare the land and purchase seeds for planting.

loans.name: Jenny Erenia

texts.es:
San Juan de Limay un municipio que pertenece al departamento de Estelí conocido en gran parte por su artesanía y gente trabajadora en la ganadería , vive Jenny Erenia con sus dos hijos y sus papas  al que tiene el deber de mantener y darles sus estudios ,su profesión abmistracion de empresas.  

 Jenny trabaja en un centro estatal de san Juan de Limay desde hace 5 años en el área de control de expediente y aseadora hospitalaria , conocida como una persona honrada y trabajadora, su principal deseo es preparar a sus hijos que están menores de edad  y poder contribuir a que tengan una buena educación.

Reciente mente nos visito en nuestras oficinas y nos solicito un nuevo  crédito, para mejoras de su vivienda donde le satisfaría salir  beneficiada y realizar las mejoras de su casa y tener  en un techo más digno  donde pueda habitarlo con su familia en condiciones más saludable y mejorar cada día su nivel de vida
texts.en:
Jenny Erenia lives in San Juan de Lima, a municipality in the Estelí department.  It is widely known for its crafts and its people who work hard with livestock.  Jenny Erenia lives with her two children and their parents for whom she has the responsibility of supporting and providing an education.  Her profession is business administration.

Jenny has worked in a state center in San Juan de Limay for five years.  She works in the area of document inspection and as a hospital assistant.  She is known for being an honest and hard-working person.  Her main wish is to prepare her children, who are minors, and to be able to contribute towards the children having a good education.

She recently visited the Ceprodel offices and requested a new loan.  She wants the loan in order to make improvements to her house.  It would make her happy to make improvements to her house and to have a more decent roof over their heads.  She wants to be able to live with her family under healthier conditions and improve her standard of living each day.

loans.use: to buy supplies and pay for labor to improve her house.

loans.name: Carlos Alberto

texts.es:
En el municipio  de san Juan de Limay, vive Carlos Alberto con su esposa y 2 hijos al que tiene el deber de mantener y darles su estudios, de profesión, agricultor en granos básicos y ganadero, en ganado de leche y engorde.

Don Carlos conocido como una persona honesta y emprendedora, tiene más de 12 años de experiencia y trabajar estos rubros, trabaja en su finca que es alta mente productiva y quiere sacarle un buen provecho explotándola en uno de los mejores rubros de la zona como es el ganado, su esposa una mujer trabajadora  le ayuda a administrar una pequeña pulpería donde obtiene otros ingresos para mantener los gastos del hogar.

Solicita un tercer crédito, donde piensa Salir  beneficiado y así  comprar  4 novillos de engorde y repastarlos por un lapso de un año, luego venderlos ya que estos tendrán el peso necesario para la  venta en el matadero y de esta manera él obtener otros ingresos que le ayudará a mejorar mas su finca y el nivel económico de su familia.
texts.en:
Carlos Alberto lives together with his wife and two children in the municipality of San Juan de Limay. He is responsible for his children’s support and for their studies. Carlos is a farmer; he grows basic grains and raises meat and milk cattle.

Mr. Carlos is known as an honest and enterprising person. He has more than twelve years of experience in this activity and works his own land, which is highly productive. He now wants to make the most out of it by raising cattle, which is one of the best options for local people. His wife is a hardworking woman who runs a small grocery store, which contributes with additional income for the family’s expenses.

Mr. Carlos is requesting his third loan. He hopes to receive it in order to buy four steers to raise for a year and sell them to the slaughterhouse once they have reached the right weight. In this way, he will have an income that will help him improve his farm and his family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy four steers to raise and sell once they have reached the right weight.

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es:
Condega  un municipio que está ubicado en la parte norte del departamento de Estelí, conocido como tierra de alfareros por su artesanía y gente trabajadora. Vive Miguel Angel en una comunidad aledaña, con su esposa y 5 hijos al que tiene el deber de mantener y darles sus estudios, de profesión, agricultor en granos básicos y la ganadería en una pequeña escala.

Conocido como una persona honesta y trabajadora tiene una propiedad de diez manzanas de extensión con diferentes tipos de aéreas para la explotación agrícola y ganaderas.

Recientemente se presento a ceprodel para  solicitar un crédito para compra de abono, manguera y mano de obra, donde piensa salir beneficiado y darle el mantenimiento correspondiente  a su finca y su café. 
El lleva 8 créditos para este tipo de actividad, tiene 8 años de trabajar con Ceprodel. El impacto y beneficios que tiene el y su familia es de una forma positiva ya que trabajan  su finca en mejores condiciones que le permiten  mejorar su actividad de trabajo y nivel de vida.
texts.en:
Condega is a town in the northern part of the department of Estelí, known as a land of potters because of its crafts and hardworking people.  Miguel Angel lives in a neighboring community with his wife and five children, whom he has to support and give an education.  His profession is farming basic grains and small-scale livestock.

Known as an honest and hardworking person, he has property that measures 10 manzanas [1 mz. = 1.68 acres] with different areas for farming and livestock.

Recently he visited the office of CEPRODEL and he's requesting a loan to buy fertilizer and hoses and to pay for labor.  He plans to make a profit and provide the necessary maintenance on his farm and his coffee.

He has had eight loans for this type of work.  He has been working with CEPRODEL for eight years.  The impact on and the benefits to himself and his family are positive because his farm is in better condition, which allows him to improve his work and standard of living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and hoses, and to pay for labor

loans.name: Ayat

texts.en: Ayat is a 20-year-old single lady, and she has three younger brothers. Ayat is a university student majoring in political sciences and is working hard to graduate and work in the field. Now she is applying for a loan to pay her registration fees for the upcoming semester.

loans.use: to pay registration fees for the upcoming semester

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en: Mohammad is a 58-year-old man and father of three boys and two girls. He has a consulting and learning center where he gives different training courses. Now Mohammad wants to enhance his learning center and add new courses, employ more trainers, and buy some required equipment, so he has applied for this loan.

loans.use: to employ more trainers and buy some required equipment

loans.name: Koba

texts.en: Koba, age 33, is an artisan. He lives in a village in the Tskaltubo district with his mother and two children. Koba’s wife lives and works abroad to help her family financially. Koba keeps busy running the family's small-scale agricultural business. He sows maize on the family-owned land and sells an average of 600 kg per year. Also, he runs a poultry farm with 40 hens and turkeys and sells them seasonally. Koba has requested credit for the purpose of building a greenhouse. The new business will be an additional source of income for the family, which will allow them to combat the poverty in which they live. Koba’s loan request was approved within the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and Credo. This start-up loan program offers business start-up capital and re-startup credit with generous lending conditions to country rural poor, who often do not have access to credit as they are regarded as “high risk borrowers” because of their low income. With the received credit, Koba will purchase materials for the greenhouse construction (iron pillars and polyethylene covering) and will then construct the greenhouse, where tomatoes, cucumbers and greens will be grown throughout the year. Koba will work in the greenhouse himself. He will sell the harvested products at the local open market. The income of the family will significantly increase and they will be able to improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to construct a greenhouse

loans.name: Marixa

texts.es:
Marixa, administra una pupuseria y un chalet, está casada, tiene tres hijos de 14, 8 y 6 años de edad, el negocio le ayuda para cubrir algunos gastos del hogar, su horario es de 6:00am a 4:00pm en el chalet, tiene cuatro años de experiencia. 
Ella necesita realizar la compra de mercadería  para aumentar la variedad en el chalet comprando gaseosas, boquitas, galletas, tambien materiales para la pupuseria, chicharrón, maíz, frijol, repollo, entre otros productos, esto le ayudara para aumentar sus ventas.
La aspiración de Marixa es a través de su trabajo poder mejorar las instalaciones de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Marixa runs a pupusa shop and food stand.  She is married and has three children, ages 14, 8, and 6.  The business helps her cover some of the household expenses.  She works from 6:00 am to 4:00 pm and has been doing this for four years.

She needs to buy merchandise, such as soft drinks, snacks, cookies, and ingredients to make pupusas such as pork rinds, dried corn, beans, cabbage, and other things to increase her variety.  This will help her increase her sales.

Marixa’s aspitation is to improve her home through her work.

loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Jacqueline Roxana

texts.es:
Jacqueline, necesita mejorar la tienda, comprando mas mercadería para poder atender mejor a las necesidades de los clientes, se comprara aceite, frijoles, arroz, condimentos, pastas, entre otros que son necesarios y demandados por los clientes.
Ella manifiesta que el préstamo anterior le ayudo a generar más ingresos, ya que la variedad de productos aumento la demanda. En su familia las condiciones económicas esta mejorando gracias a las ventas.
texts.en:
Jacqueline needs to improve her shop by buying more stock so she can meet her client's requests better. She will buy oil, beans, rice, condiments and pasta among other things which are necessary and in demand from her clients.

She states that her last loan helped her generate more income as a bigger variety of products increases demand. In her family, their economic condition is improving thanks to the sales.

loans.use: to buy oil, beans, rice, condiments and pasta.

loans.name: Zoila

texts.es:
Zoila, de 37 años, es una mujer amable, buena y trabajadora, es conviviente con Roy con quien tiene 04 hijos, de 15, 08, 04, y 02 años. Viven en casa de su mamá hasta que puedan juntar lo suficiente para poder comprar una casa propia, pero mientras tanto trabaja mucho para poder brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia. Zoila, tiene como trabajo la venta de productos de belleza tales como maquillajes, perfumes, cremas para manos, entre otros, en su cuadra tiene muchos clientes quienes son sus vecinos, amigos y familiares, hace sus pedidos al por mayor por medio de catálogos. Espera en su casa a que vayan sus clientes y cuando no hay ventas sale a buscarlos, pues durante los 02 años que se dedica a este trabajo aprendió que hay que ir a buscar a los clientes para poder venderles algún producto, trabaja sola ya que eso le permite tener mejores ganancias.
Este trabajo le gusta mucho debido a que le genera buenas ganancias, pero también le exigen mucho en cuanto a calidad y diseño, además no es muy pesado y lo puede hacer en el tiempo disponible que tiene cada día, espera poder seguir trabajando y mas adelante tener una tienda en donde pueda ofertar sus prendas de manera mas cómoda a sus clientes. Por tanto éste será el primer préstamo con MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración para continuar con sus objetivos. Por otro lado se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal por que todos sus integrantes son personas que son responsables y muy solidarios.
Con el monto solicitado 900 soles, comprará mas mercadería como perfumes, talcos, desodorantes, etc. Entonces  tendrá variedad de productos para ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Zoila, age 37, is a nice, good, and hard-working woman.  She is in a common-law marriage with Roy, and they have four children, ages 15, 8, 4, and 2.  They are living in her mother’s house until they are able to get together enough to buy their own house.  Meanwhile, she works a lot in order to be able to give her family a better quality of life.

Zoila sells beauty products like make-up, perfume, and hand cream, among others.  On her block she has a lot of customers who are her neighbors, friends, and relatives.  She makes her orders wholesale through catalogs.  

She waits at her house for her customers.  When there are no sales, she leaves to look for them.  She has been doing this work for two years.  She has learned how to go looking for customers in order to be able to sell a product.  She works alone because this allows her to have better income.

She likes this work a lot because it generates good income for her and because it calls for a lot in regards to quality and fashion.  Also, it is not very difficult, and she is able to do it during the time she has available each day.  

She hopes to be able to continue working.  Later on she hopes to have a store where she is able to offer her items to her customers in a more comfortable way.  

This will be her first loan with MFP.  She hopes for your help in order to continue on with her objectives.  She pledges to make her payments.  It pleases her to be part of her communal bank because all of the members are very responsible and supportive people.

She will use the requested 900 soles to buy more merchandise like perfume, powder, and deodorant, etc.  Then she will have a variety of products to offer her customers.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise like perfume, powder, and deodorant, etc.

loans.name: Noelali

texts.es:
Noelali, de 48 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa, además de ser amable y cordial. Es separada del padre de su hijo. Habita una casa alquilada en compañía de su hijo, su nuera y una sobrina.
Ella se dedica en la venta de ropa usadas para damas y caballeros. Este producto lo lleva a los lugares alejados de la ciudad en las diferentes comunidades y con este negocio ha logrado consolidarse economicamente. Considera su negocio rentable por la demanda que tiene y las ganancias que le deja y tiene planes de seguir con su negocio y hacerlo crecer. Este será el préstamo número 04 con la institución MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos. Por otro lado, le gusta el trabajo que viene realizando en su banco comunal apoyando a las personas en avanzar con sus negocios.
Con el monto solicitado de 1500 nuevos soles lo invertirá en la compra de ropa usada, para ello solicitará a una amiga que vive en la capital para que le envíe el producto comprado.
texts.en:
48-year-old Noelali is a hardworking and persevering woman, and she's also friendly and kind. She's separated from the father of her son. She lives in a rented house with her son, her daughter-in-law and a niece.
She sells used clothing for women and men. She takes this merchandise to various communities located on the outskirts of the town, and through this business she has succeeded in becoming financially stable. She considers her business to be profitable because there's demand for it and she earns proceeds from it. She has plans to keep her business going and expand it. This will be her 4th loan with MFP, so she hopes to get your cooperation in order to move forward with her goals. On the other hand, she enjoys the work she's been doing in her communal bank by helping people to make progress in their businesses.
With the requested amount of 1500 nuevos soles she'll purchase used clothing. She'll ask a friend who lives in the capital to send her the acquired products.

loans.use: to purchase second-hand clothing

loans.name: Ana Del Pilar

texts.es:
Ana pertenece a la comuna de La Pintana en Santiago, vende ropa deportiva y gran variedad de perfumes, todos sus productos son de marca internacional, hace dos años que comercializa su mercadería a pedido, abarcando otros sectores a parte de su comuna, trabaja desde su casa de lunes a domingo y tiene su clientela fija. 
Adquiere sus productos en los Outlet, a bajo costo o precio mayorista, por lo que le permite ofrecerlos a buen precio.
Utiliza su préstamo para aumentar su stock y adquirir más variedad de ropa y surtir sus perfumes. 
Su meta es tener un puesto fijo donde comercialice sus productos y posteriormente aspira a poseer un local propio.
Para Ana su principal motivación para mantener su negocio es su familia, es casada, vive con sus  5 hijos y un nieto. 
Le gusta trabajar con Fondo Esperanza porque ha logrado ser independiente, maneja su tiempo y le permite tener espacio y dedicación a su familia.
La Pintana es una comuna ubicada al sur de Santiago (capital de Chile), en la región Metropolitana. Se caracteriza por ser una comuna con altos índices de pobreza, donde más de un 10 por ciento de los habitantes vive en situación de indigencia. Por lo anterior, la autoridad local (municipalidad) se ha preocupado de desarrollar variados programas sociales enfocados a aportar al  mejoramiento de la calidad de vida de sus habitantes.
texts.en:
Ana lives in the La Pintana community in Santiago.  She sells athletic clothing and a wide variety of perfume.  All her products are international brands.  She has been selling her merchandise on order for two years, going to other areas as well as her own community.  She works from home from Monday through Sunday and she has her steady customers.  She acquires her products in the outlet stores at low cost or wholesale, which allows her to sell them for a good price.

She's using her loan to increase her stock and acquire more variety of clothing and to stock her perfumes.

Her goal is to have a fixed location for selling her products and later she hopes to get her own place.

Ana's principal reason for maintaining her business is her family.  She's married and lives with her five children and a grandchild.

She says she likes to work with Fondo Esperanza because she has managed to be independent, she manages her time, and it allows her to have space and dedication for her family.

La Pintana is a community located in the south of Santiago (the capital of Chile), in the Metropolitan Region.  It's known for being a community with a high poverty rate, where more than 10 percent of the residents live in poverty.  Because of this, the local authority (the town) has taken care to develop various social programs that focus on improving the quality of life of the residents.

loans.use: to buy clothing and perfume

loans.name: Medalid

texts.es:
Medalid de 25 años comparte una vida marital junto a Rogelio de 28 años y junto a ellos su pequeño Junior de 7 años. Residen en una vivienda construida a base de material noble en calidad de alquiler.
Anteriormente brindaba apoyo a su madre quien se dedicaba en la venta de comida en el mercado de abastos de su localidad y con motivo de aportar de manera activa con el crecimiento de la economía familiar decidió iniciar su negocio propio consistente en un juguería fuente de soda gracias a una tía suya que le brinda un local en calidad de alquiler.
Lleva 5 años en el rubro y gracias a ello a logrado apoyar económicamente en los gastos que requiere sacar adelante a una familia.
Luego de muchos años de esfuerzo logro junto a Rogelio adquirir un lote de terreno en donde iniciaron la construcción de una vivienda a base de material noble motivo por el cual desean culminar el primer paso del sueño con el techado del mismo.
Sus objetivos a largo plazo apuntan en concluir el segundo piso de su vivienda y posteriormente dedicarse al alquiler de habitaciones de manera prolongada paralelo a usar el primer piso de su futuro domicilio como local para su juguería. En esta ocasión desea contar con 3,000 nuevos soles para complementar su capital y proceder con el techado de su futura vivienda esperando así cumplir el sueño de la casa propia.
texts.en:
Medalid, 25, lives a married life with Rogelio, 28, along with her little Junior, age 7.  They live in a rented house built of solid materials.  Previously they supported her mother, who made a living selling food in the market in their town.

To contribute actively to the growth of the family economy she decided to start her own business, a juice bar-soda fountain, thanks to an aunt who rents space to her.  She has worked in the business for five years, thanks to which she has managed to help pay the expenses she needs to get her family ahead.

After many years of effort, she and Rogelio managed to acquire a plot of land where they started building a brick house.  They want to complete the first step toward their dream by building the roof.

Her long-term goals are to finish the second floor of her house and later make a living renting rooms for extended periods, as well as to use the first floor of her future house as a space for her juice bar.

Currently she needs 3,000 nuevos soles [PEN] to supplement her capital and continue with the roof of her future house, thus achieving her dream of having her own house.

loans.use: to buy construction materials for a roof

loans.name: Elchin

texts.en:
Elchin is a young man who lives in the Baku region of Azerbaijan. He is 24 years old and single. He recently started a flower business. 

Elchin needs a loan of 2,300 AZN (Azerbaijani New Manat) to buy to buy wood chips and fertilizer for the greenhouse. In the future, he wants to continue to improve his new business.

loans.use: to buy wood chips and fertilizer for his greenhouse

loans.name: George

texts.en:
George is a 37-year-old farmer from Kitale county in Kenya, where he lives with his wife and four children who are all in school. He has been farming for the past seven years producing milk, maize, eggs, and beans, which he sells at the local market in his area. 

He is requesting a loan in the amount of  60,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to purchase poultry birds. He will sell their products and earn extra income to help him uplift his livelihood and also pay for his children’s schooling. He aspires to be the leading egg supplier in his area in the next five years.

Poor transport networks and high competition are his major challenges in farming.

George hopes Juhudi Kilimo will introduce school fee loans in the near future.

loans.use: To purchase poultry birds

loans.name: La Quebradilla El Punto Group

texts.es:
La señora Rosalinda Maribel esta casada, tiene 30 años de edad, cursó los 4 años de educación primaria, tiene 4 hijos 3 de los cuales están estudiando, se dedica a la preparación y venta de pan, inicio este negocio con poca cantidad y vender por poquito, hasta el momento lleva 7 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien  se dedica a la albañilería.

Organiza un grupo para solicitar un préstamo, que los utilizaran para  la compra de insumo, tales como harina, levadura, azúcar, etc. Quiere  incrementar su producción espera seguir mejorando y en el futuro contar con varios locales de venta. Las demás integrantes se dedican al cultivo de papas, venta de golosinas, venta de ropa y venta de maíz. una de las personas de la foto no califico al préstamo.
texts.en:
Rosalinda Maribel is married and is 30 years old. She has completed 4 years of primary education. She has got 4 children; 3 of whom are in school. She prepares and sells bread. She started this business with a small amount and sold little by little. Now she has had 7 years of experience. She counts on her husband who works as a brick-layer as support. 

She organises a group who together are requesting this loan which they will use to buy ingredients such as flour, yeast, sugar etc. 

She wants to increase her production. She hopes to keep improving so that in the future she will sell from various places. 

The other members of the group grow potatoes or sell sweets, clothes or corn. One of the people in this photo was not qualified for the loan,

loans.use: to buy ingredients

loans.name: Gevorg

texts.en:
Gevorg is engaged in agriculture, in Ararat region. He has an apricot garden, which is the main source of his family’s income, near Vedi city.
 
After high school and military service, Gevorg worked as a tractor driver in Ararat region. For a long time he accumulated money, and last year he finally bought his own farm tractor. The machine helps him in his farming activity and, at the same time, he decided to offer the tractor for rent to other farmers, and he hopes to receive supplemental profit from this deal. Gevorg owns the only farm tractor in their village, and he is very proud that he can assist his neighboring villagers with his tractor.
 
Gevorg is 26 years old and lives with his parents, brother and sister, near Vedi city, Ararat region. His father once a year leaves Armenia, for seasonal work in the Russian Federation. At these times, Gevorg bears all responsibility for providing for his family's needs. Inasmuch as Gevorg’s tractor is worn out, now he needs a loan of about 1,000 US dollars, to repair it before the start of spring sowing. The loan would help him to arrange his spring rural work more effectively.

loans.use: To repair his tractor before the start of spring sowing time

loans.name: Margaret

texts.en:
Margaret is 49 years old and lives in Nyandarua South. She is married and has four children, who are aged between twenty and nine years.

Margaret has a farming business that she has been running for the past 28 years. She has applied for her first loan from KADET LTD to enable her to prepare the land, buy seedlings and buy fertilizers 

She hopes to continue farming, and to improve her family's living standard in the near future.

loans.use: To prepare the land and to buy seedlings and fertilizers

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay his school fees.

loans.name: Nairesiae

texts.en:
Nairesiae is 52 years old and single and supports a family of three children. She has been running a posho mill for the last three years, making a monthly income of 18,000 Kenyan Shillings (KES). 

Nairesiae has applied for her fifth loan of 50,000 KES from KADET LTD, and she plans to use it to purchase maize stock for grinding into maize flour, which she will sell. The anticipated profits will support her business operations. 

Nairesiae's future dream is to educate her children and improve her family's living standards.

loans.use: To purchase more maize for flour production.

loans.name: Collins

texts.en: Collins, 26 years old, is married and supports a family of four. He has run a carpentry stall for the last eight years, making a monthly income of KES 15,000. Collins has applied for his first loan of KES 20,000 from KADET LTD. He plans to purchase timber and other materials for his shop. Collins will use the anticipated income to pay for school fees. His future dream is to improve his family's living standards

loans.use: To purchase timber and other materials

loans.name: Jennifer

texts.en: Jennifer is a 46-year-old married woman living in Masindi, Uganda. She operates a wholesale shop where she sells general merchandise such as soap, sugar and other items. Jennifer's business is located on a busy street, thus exploiting the vast market. Her main business challenges are price fluctuations and high license fees. Jennifer's desire is to expand her business to new markets. She intends to use the loan to pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: to pay school fees for her children.

loans.name: Cirila Faviana

texts.es:
Cirila tiene 38años de edad, es madre de 3 hijos a quienes ama muchísimo y a quienes saca adelante sola ya que ella es madre soltera y cada día lucha de manera incansable para poder brindarle a sus hijos las oportunidades que ella no tuvo; ya que Cirila solo pudo estudiar hasta el quinto grado de secundaria, debido a sus pocos recursos económicos. La vivienda donde habita Cirila se encuentra en la ciudad de Camana, caracterizada por su clima variado y asimismo por el desarrollo de su agricultura en especial el cultivo de arroz. 

Día a día Cirila trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de comida, en especial ella venden pollo broster, caldo de gallina, salchipapas, entre otros, Cirilla trabaja alrededor de 8 horas al día y puede atender hasta 20 clientes diariamente; ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy amable con los clientes y también porque tiene una buena sazón.

Cirila está muy feliz y agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar utensilios para su negocio como sartenes, cucharones, coladores, entre otros, así ella podrá tener los materiales necesarios para poder trabajar y mejorara la atención a sus clientes, lo que le permitirá poder mejorar sus ingresos y seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Darle una buena profesión a sus hijos y poder tener un mejor local para su negocio”.
texts.en:
Cirila is 38 years old. She is the mother of three children whom she loves so much and for whom she works to succeed on her own because she is a single mother and every day she fights tirelessly to be able to give her children the opportunities that she did not have. Cirila was only able to study until the fifth grade of secondary school, due to financial difficulties. The home where Cirila lives is in the city of Camana, known for its varied climate as well as for its agricultural development, especially the cultivation of rice.

Day by day, Cirila works in her small business selling meals. Her specialty is selling broasted chicken, chicken broth, salchipapas, and other meals. Cirila works about eight hours per day and may have up to 20 customers a day. She believes things are going well for her business because she is very friendly to her customers and because she has good seasoning (for her food).

Cirila is very happy and grateful to the Kiva lenders because thanks to their help, she will be able to buy utensils for her business, such as frying pans, ladles, colanders, and other items. This way, she will be able to have the materials she needs to be able to work and improve her customer service, which will allow her to be able to improve her income and continue fighting to be able to make her greatest dream come true: to give her children good careers and to have a better location for her business.

loans.use: be able to purchase utensils such as frying pans, ladles, colanders, and other items.

loans.name: Herminia

texts.es: Herminia de 40 años de edad habita unto a su familia, su esposo y sus hijos. Es una mujer muy trabajadora, emprendedora, honesta y visionaria, todas las mañanas se levanta con nuevas aspiraciones y deseos de superación. Herminia se dedica al cultivo de los principales granos básicos de la zona como lo son maíz y frijol y lo hace a diario, durante toda su vida ha sido así, lo que a ella más le importa en la vida es que sus hijos estén bien y que en su hogar no haga falta el pan de cada día es por eso que solicita a INTEGRAL un préstamo para la compra de insumos agrícolas como: fertilizantes, pesticidas, semillas y abonos para tener los mejores cultivos y así venderlos a mejores precios como lo ha hecho durante toda su vida y sobre todo seguirle permitiendo llevar el sustento diario a su hogar.
texts.en:
Herminia is 40 years old and lives with her family, her husband and children. She is a very hard-working, entrepreneurial, honest and visionary woman. Every morning she gets up with new aspirations and desires to improve her situation. She cultivates the most important staple grains in her area which are corn and beans. She has done this daily throughout her life.

The most important things to her are that her children are well and that her home doesn't lack food. For this reason, she has requested a loan from INTEGRAL to buy agricultural supplies such as: fertilizers, pesticides, seeds and compost so that she will have better harvests and thus sell at better prices as she has done all her life.

Most of all, it will allow her provide for her household's daily needs.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, pesticides, seeds and compost

loans.name: Yusra

texts.en:
Yusra is a 46-year-old married woman. Her husband is a vocational worker. They have two girls and one boy, and live in a small rented home. 

To help her husband in paying some of the household bills, Yusra sells detergents and clothes. She is now applying for a loan to procure a new collection of clothing items in order to increase her profits.

loans.use: to bring new collection of clothing items

loans.name: Sydney

texts.en:
Sydney, now 20 years of age, has a boutique business in Emali town, Kenya, where she sells clothes. Her merchandise includes clothes for men, women, and children. She has been in this business for two years and it has been profitable. The income from the business has enabled her to provide for the needs of her child.

This being her first loan, Sydney plans to use the money to buy more stock of clothes for her shop. This will enable her to meet the demands of her customers and thereby generate more income, with which she plans to buy a dairy cow.

Sydney hopes to grow her business, make more income, and buy more dairy cows in the future, as well as build residential houses.

loans.use: To buy more stock of clothes for sale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy land.

loans.name: Chris M.

texts.en: Chris, 26 years old, lives in Paynesville South, one of the populated areas in Montserrado County. She is a single mother of a 4-year-old child who attends school and lives at home. For the past 5 years, Chris has been selling bread in the local  market. She makes some profit at times, but mostly business is slow. She is requesting a loan to purchase more bread for her business. Chris' plan for the future is to build her house.

loans.use: to purchase more bread for her business.

loans.name: Beatrice

texts.en:
Beatrice, a 41-year-old farmer, lives in Kitale county, Kenya with her husband and four children, three of them still in school. She has been farming for the past five years, producing milk and eggs, which she sells at the local market.

Beatrice is requesting a loan of 40,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to purchase poultry birds. She will sell the products and earn extra income to help uplift her livelihood and pay for her children’s schooling. Beatrice aspires to be the leading poultry products supplier in her area in the next five years. Beatrice's major farming challenges are poultry diseases and lack of enough feeds. She is very grateful to Juhudi Kilimo for giving her the loan.

loans.use: To purchase poultry

loans.name: Vianney

texts.en: Vianney is a hardworking 39-year-old man living in Masindi, Uganda. He operates a bar where he sells drinks such as sodas and beers. His business is located along the shores of Lake Albert, and he began the business in order to earn a living. He also fishes from the lake for additional income. He has four children to look after, and his desire is to educate them up to the University level. Vianney is requesting a loan to buy more soda and beer to sell in his pub.

loans.use: to buy soda and beer to sell.

loans.name: Concepción

texts.es:
En el municipio de ciudad Sandino ubicada en Managua, Don Concepción es conocido como una persona honrada, responsable, honesta y dedicado al trabajo.

 Concepción de 58 años actualmente trabaja en una institución del estado, cuenta con una persona bajo su cargo, su esposa no cuenta con ningún ingreso es ama de casa. 

Con lo poco del salario que el gana, no puede construir un pequeño anexo a su vivienda ya que su sueño es ampliarla más, debido que es pequeña para que la familia viva más cómoda.

Es por eso que  solicita financiamiento de ceprodel y kiva. Dicho crédito lo estaré invirtiendo en la compra de cemento, arena, bloque y pago de mano de obra, sus principales sueños es construir un dormitorio que le dará mejores condiciones de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
In the city of Sandino, Managua, Don Concepción is regarded as a honourable, responsible, honest and hard-working person. He is 58 years old and currently works for a state institution with an employee under his supervision. His wife is at home and doesn't have any income. 

With his low salary, he can't afford building a small annex to his house. It is his dream to enlarge the house, which is small, and for his family to live more comfortably. This is why he's requesting a loan from Ceprodel and Kiva, which he will use to buy cement, sand, blocks and workforce. His biggest dream is to build an extra room that would give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Naomi

texts.en:
Naomi is 33 years old. She lives in Ndunyu Njeru of Nyandarua South and is married with three children, who are ages four to ten years old.

Naomi has a salon business that she has been running for the past three years and has applied for a loan from KADET LTD to enable her buy hair dryers to put in her salon.

She hopes to expand her beauty salon in the near future.

loans.use: To buy hair dryers

loans.name: Maxwell

texts.en: Maxwell is a 43-year-old married man with three children living in Masindi, Uganda. He operates a retail shop selling general merchandise. He also fishes to earn additional income. Maxwell's business is located along the shores of Lake Albert and his major clients are people around the lake. His major business challenges are inadequate capital and weather changes. Maxwell's dream is to buy a new vehicle to transport goods. Maxwell is requesting a loan to buy general merchandise, such as sugar and salt, to sell.

loans.use: to buy general merchandise, such as sugar and salt, to sell.

loans.name: Watta

texts.en: Watta is 32 years old and lives in Paynesville South, one of the populated areas in Montserrado County, Liberia. She is single with four children between the ages of 3 and 11, who are attending school and live at home.  For the past 10 years, Watta has run a restaurant in the local market. She makes more profits sometimes, but most of the time, business is slow. She is requesting a loan to purchase more rice, pepper, charcoal, and oil for her business. Her plan for the future is to educate her children and build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more rice, pepper, charcoal, and oil for her business.

loans.name: Bernice Group

texts.en:
This is a group of six members who sell second-hand clothes, rice, sandals, toothpaste and brushes, and provisions. The group includes Bernice, Adjetey, Eva, Diana, Georgina, and Doris. Their ages range from 30 to 56 years.

Bernice is the leader of the group and she is a 30-year-old married woman with two children. Her husband, Samuel, is a 31-year-old businessman who always tries to support Bernice in her business. Bernice has been selling second-hand clothing since her first loan cycle and is still doing this business. She is now on her 5th loan cycle with ID-Ghana and is requesting 1,000 GHC to buy more ladies' tops and jeans.

Bernice was given 800 GHC in her 4th loan cycle and completed repayment without trouble. She has also been able to save enough with ID-Ghana.

Bernice, together with her friends, needs a total amount of 3,300 GHC to buy enough items to sell to customers.

loans.use: To buy more second-hand clothing to sell to customers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase poultry

loans.name: John

texts.en:
John, a 39-year-old farmer, lives in Kitale county, Kenya, with his wife and two children, both in school. He has been farming for the past nine years, producing milk, maize and eggs, which he sells at the local market.

John is requesting a loan of 31,200 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to buy and insure a dairy cow. The cow will provide him with more milk products and earn him extra income to help boost his living standards and to pay for his children’s education. John's major farming challenges are the lack of readily available markets, diseases and poor roads. He hopes to have three good quality dairy cows in the next five years.

loans.use: To buy and insure a dairy cow

loans.name: Mama

texts.en: Mama, 45 years old, lives in Paynesville, one of the populated areas in Montserrado County. She is married and has three children aged between 17 and 25 years old. Mama's children are currently in school and only two live at home. Since 2007, Mama has been selling soap in the local market. She started this business with a little amount received from her husband. Mama enjoys the buying from her customers and the money that she generates from her business. She is requesting a loan to purchase more soap to enlarge her business. Mama plans to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more soap to enlarge her business,

loans.name: `grace

texts.en: Grace, 23 years old, lives in Paynesville South, one of the populated areas in Montserrado County. She is single and has a one-year-old child who lives at home.  For the past four years, Grace has been selling charcoal in the community market. She makes a profit and has many customers. Grace is requesting a loan to purchase more charcoal for her business. Her plan for the future is to educate her child.

loans.use: to purchase more charcoal for her business.

loans.name: Esther

texts.en: Esther, 44 years old, lives in Paynesville, one of the populated areas in Montserrado County. She is married to a teacher and the couple has six children aged between 20 and 29 years old. The children are currently in school and only three live at home. For the past five years, Esther has been selling charcoal in the local market. She makes a lot of profit and has many customers. Esther is requesting a loan to purchase more charcoal to expand her business. Her plans are to build a house and to educate her children.

loans.use: to purchase more charcoal to expand her business

loans.name: Ezinas

texts.en:
Ezinas is 24 years old. She is a farmer in the Kitale county in Kenya, where she lives with her husband and two children. Both her children are in school. 

Ezinas has been in farming for the past three years, producing milk and eggs which she sells at the local market.

She is requesting a loan of 62,400 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to buy and insure a dairy cow that will provide her with more milk. Ezinas will sell the milk and earn extra income. She will use this income to improve her living conditions and pay for her children’s schooling. She aspires to buy yet another dairy cow in the next five years.

Diseases and price fluctuation are her major challenges in farming.

loans.use: to buy and insure a dairy cow

loans.name: Betty

texts.en:
Betty is 55 years old and lives in Paynesville, one of the populated areas in Montserrado County. She is married and her husband is a teacher. Both of them have three children between 12 to 28 years old. They are currently in school and live at home. 

For the past twelve years, Betty has been selling rice, oil, cool water, etc. in the local market. She makes a lot of profit and has more customers. 

She is requesting a loan to purchase more rice, oil, cool water, etc. for her business. Her plan is to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more rice, oil, cool water, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Noe Humberto

texts.es: Noé de 44 años de edad habita junto a su familia en su casa propia. Es un hombre muy trabajador que en la vida lo que más le ha importado es dar lo mejor de si para que a sus hijos jamás le haga falta el pan de cada día. Noé es un hombre muy emprendedor que siempre se caracteriza por ser un padre y esposo ejemplar muy conocidos por sus vecinos por ser  atento, responsable y muy carismático. Su profesión es ser agricultor y comercializa lo que cosecha que son los principales granos básicos maíz y frijol, Noé explica las razones porque decidió adquirir un préstamo con INTEGRAL y manifiesta que desea  comprar los insumos agrícolas antes de tiempo de cosecha ya que están por lo regular más baratos desea comprar: semillas, abonos, fertilizantes y pesticidas. Espera que Dios y personas de buen corazón le den la ayuda solicitada así podrá seguir dándole una buena vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Noé, 44, lives with his family in his own house.  He's a very hardworking man.  What has mattered to him most in life is to give the best of himself so his children never lack their daily nourishment.

Noé is a very enterprising man who always distinguishes himself as an exemplary father and husband; he's well known among his neighbors for being attentive, responsible, and very charismatic.  He's a farmer and he sells what he harvests, which is corn and beans, the main basic grains.

Noé explains why he decided to get a loan from Integral and says he wants to buy agricultural supplies before the harvest because they're usually cheaper.  He wants to buy seeds, manure, fertilizer, and pesticide.

He hopes that God and good-hearted people give him the help he's asking for so he'll be able to continue giving his family a good life.

loans.use: to buy seeds, manure, fertilizer, and pesticide

loans.name: Ameera

texts.en:
Ameera is a 37-year-old housewife. Her husband works in an office during the day, and in the evening he works at his hot drinks stall selling coffee and tea. Recently, he added a new service providing kids' cars for rent while their parent are having coffee or tea in the park. 

Ameera wants to support her husband, so she has applied for a loan to procure more types of kids' carriages and toys for his business.

loans.use: to buy more types of children's carriages and toys.

loans.name: Alfreda

texts.en: Alfreda, 42 years old, lives in Montserrado County, the highest producing fishing area of Liberia. She is married and has four children between the ages of 13 and 25 years old. The children all live at home and only four attend school. Alfreda was unable to attend school, but she is good at managing her business and her husband is a businessman. For the past three years, Alfreda has been selling rice, pepper, vita, bread, etc. in the community. She sells every day and spends 13 hours at her business. Alfreda started this business with a little income she received from her husband. She is requesting a loan to purchase more rice, pepper, vita (a juice drink), bread, etc. for her business. She hopes to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more rice, pepper, vita, bread, etc.

loans.name: Sannie

texts.en:
Sannie is 45 years old and lives in the area of Paynesville City in Montserrado County, which is the highest fish-producing area in Liberia. She and her husband live with their two children, ages 20 and 30 years old, one of whom attends school. 

For the past two years, Sannie has been operating a little shop where she sells charcoal. She started this business with a loan from her mothe. She enjoys her business because she has a lot of customers. She is requesting a loan to purchase more bags of charcoal for her business. Sannie plans to build a house in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase more bags of charcoal for her business,

loans.name: Julia Praxedes

texts.es: Julia, tiene 53 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su conyugue, tiene 8 hijos,  reside en el municipio de Quimistan, Santa Bárbara junto a sus tres hijos y conyugue.  Julia  lleva 12 años de realizar su propio negocio, ella elabora y vende comidas típicas como ser pastelitos rellenos con carne, baleadas, tajadas de plátano y otros. La venta la realiza de manera  ambulante  movilizándose en una bicicleta y también vende  en su casa.  Ella anteriormente vendía en una glorieta de una escuela de la comunidad, pero decidió tener su negocio independiente.  Esta solicitando un segundo préstamo a ODEF  por 10,000 Lempiras con el cual comprara insumos para la elaboración de comidas como ser harinas, granos básicos, carnes, queso, manteca, plátanos, etc. Su meta es  capitalizar su negocio para ofrecer variedad de productos y con las utilidades ayudara a su hija con el estudio, y terminar su casa.
texts.en:
Julia is 53 years of age, and lives in a common-law marriage with her partner. She has eight children, and lives in the town of Quimistan, Santa Bárbara, along with three of her children and her spouse. She has had her own business for 12 years, preparing and selling traditional foods such as small meat pies, baleadas [flour tortillas filled with a variety of ingredients], fried plantains, and other items. She works as a street vendor, moving about on a bicycle, and she also sells her goods from home. 

Julia used to work selling at a food stall in a local school, but decided that she wanted her own independent business. She has requested her second loan from ODEF, and has asked for 10,000 Lempiras to buy ingredients to prepare her food, such as flour, basic grains, meat, cheese, lard, plantains, etc. Her goal is to provide her business with capital so that she can offer a variety of products, and with her profits she plans to help her daughter with her studies and finish building her house.

loans.use: To buy supplies such as corn and wheat flour, meat, bananas, beans, cheese, rice and lard, among others, to prepare meals.

loans.name: Jose Reynaldo

texts.es:
José, necesita invertir en el cultivo de granos básicos, por esta razón se ha decidido a solicitar un nuevo préstamo, para el que comprara abono, herbicidas, alquilara tambien el terreno, siendo una manzana de terreno, en el que se dispone a realizar el nuevo cultivo.
José es agricultor trabajando con la ayuda de préstamos, el considera que su producción está aumentando, esto le permite generar más ganancias para su familia y cubrir las necesidades de la familia, mejorando sus condiciones de vida a través de los créditos Kiva.
texts.en:
Jose needs to invest in the cultivation of basic grains. For this reason, he has decided to request a new loan to purchase fertilizer and herbicides, and he will also rent land - a block of land - on which he will plant his new crop.

Jose is a farmer working with the help of loans. He feels that his production is expanding; this allows him to generate more revenue for his family and to cover family expenses, improving their living conditions through the loans from Kiva.

loans.use: purchase fertilizer, herbicides, and lease land.

loans.name: Armida Yaneth

texts.es: Armida de 31 años habita junto a su esposo y sus hijos. Élla se dedica a la crianza de pollos. Es una mujer muy emprendedora y sobre todo trabajadora. No deja pasar ninguna oportunidad de negocio. Lo más importante que realiza su trabajo con mucha dedicación y amor lo cual hace que las personas le tenga confianza y lo prefieran cada día más. Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL ya que ha estado pensando en la forma de hacer crecer sus ingresos y ha llegado a la conclusión que esta sería una buena decisión ya que los clientes tienen mucha confianza y cada vez son más los que solicitan sus servicios. El crédito lo solicita para invertir principal mente en la crianza de pollos es decir para comprar insumos como diferentes: concentrado, desparasitartes, vitaminas, etc. Para mantenerlo en buenas condiciones de tal forma que al momento de la venta estén en las mejores condiciones y así el pago por ellos sea bueno. De esta forma espera mejorar sus ganancias y poder dar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida, diferentes a las que  por el momento tienen.
texts.en:
Armida is 31 years old. She lives with her husband and children. She works raising chickens. She’s a very enterprising woman and above all hardworking. She never passes up a business opportunity. The most important thing is that she does her work with a lot of dedication and love so that people have confidence and prefer her more each day. She has taken the decision to ask for this loan from Integral as she has been thinking of how to increase her earnings and has arrived at the conclusion that this would be a good decision as the customers have a lot of confidence and each time they are asking for her services.

The loan that she is asking for is primarily to invest in chickens to raise, that is to say to buy various supplies such as: animal feed, anti-parasitics, vitamins, etc. in order to keep them in good condition so at the moment of sale they are in the best condition and thus the payment for them is good. In this way she hopes to improve her earnings and be able to give her family better life conditions, different from what they have now.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as animal feed, anti-parasitics, vitamins, etc.

loans.name: Raul

texts.en:
Raul is an artisan in Lima who specializes in traditional Peruvian weaves such as tapestries and shoulder bags. He would like to invest in the purchase of larger amounts of wool to keep production costs low and to develop new designs.

Raul has been selling through NOVICA since 2000. This is his story:

"After secondary school, I dedicated my energy to painting. My father taught me to weave in the San Pedro de las Cajas style. I love to paint and I love to weave. They are both a form of expression, and often, after I explore a theme in my weaves, I will repeat them on the canvas. When I joined Novica, I lived in a rented house with just one loom, my wife, and our newborn baby. Today, I have three looms and have invited other weavers to help weave my designs. Best of all, I can provide for my son the way I dreamed of doing so when he was born."

"Thank you very much for this microcredit. It seems like whenever we're facing hard times, you're right there for us. I will always be thankful for this."

Use the link below to view Raul's hand-woven tapestries on the NOVICA site:
http://www.novica.com/kiva/735

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of larger amounts of wool to keep production costs low and to develop new designs

loans.name: Alberto

texts.en:
Alberto is a Peruvian artisan who specializes in alpaca accessories. He would like to invest in the purchase of larger amounts of alpaca and cotton to be able to try out new designs.

Alberto has been selling through NOVICA since 2010. This is his story:

"I feel very proud to be able to contribute to the development of my country as I work with more than 20 artisan associations. Working on traditional handlooms, their craftsmanship is impeccable and of the quality required by the international market. We want to preserve the traditions that began hundreds of years ago during the days of the Inca Empire. We use natural fibers such as alpaca wool, baby alpaca, silk, and others. What I've learned about textile arts comes from my mother, who learned from my grandmother, and in this way, the knowledge has been handed down from generation to generation in our family. I've been privileged to show our designs throughout Peru and South America. I've also been able to give craft classes to the men, women and young people who want to learn all the beautiful techniques we use. Today, our people are master artisans recognized throughout Peru, and we share our knowledge with everyone who has a real desire to learn and progress."

"Thank you very much for this microcredit -- if it weren't for you, we wouldn't know where to go. It is good to know we can count on you for your support and guidance."

Use the link below to view Alberto's alpaca apparel and accessories on the NOVICA site:
http://www.novica.com/kiva/7484

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of larger amounts of alpaca and cotton to be able to try out new designs

loans.name: Marcos

texts.en:
Marcos is a Peruvian artisan who specializes in handcrafted wall mirrors and decor. He would like to stock up on the materials he uses for his mirrors, such as wood, paints and bronze leaf.

Marcos has been selling through NOVICA since 2004. This is his story:

"I am a self-taught artist and I began to work at the age of 17 at a neighbor's workshop. After only a year, I decided to venture on my own, gradually gaining renown for the beauty and quality of my work. I have been dedicated to this craft for over 35 years and to me it feels like only yesterday when I began. Woodwork makes me feel good about myself, because it's a way of preserving an aspect of Peruvian artistry."

"We ask for blessings and positive energy for you who are helping us. Sometimes we don't have the cash to invest in materials to restock the mirrors that are sold. We want to get ahead, but sometimes a person needs a hand up. Thank you so much."

Use the link below to view Marcos's handcrafted wall mirrors and decor on the NOVICA site:
http://www.novica.com/kiva/4505

loans.use: to stock up on the materials he uses for his mirrors, such as wood, paints and bronze leaf

loans.name: Musu

texts.en: Musu is 42 years old and lives in Montserrado County in Liberia. She is married and has six children between the ages of 12 to 27 years old. They all live at home and three of them attend school. Unfortunately Musu was unable to attend school, but she is good at managing her business. For the past 15 years she has been selling rice, pepper, charcoal, vita, salt, onions and other goods in the local market. She sells every day and spends eight hours on her business. She started this business with some money she received from her husband. She is requesting a loan to purchase more rice, pepper, charcoal, vita, salt, onions and other goods to sell in her business. She hopes to be able to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more rice, pepper, charcoal, vita, salt, onions and other goods for her business.

loans.name: Luz De Maria

texts.es: Luz de Maria vive junto a su esposo y sus hijos, en casa propia. Gracias a Dios es una mujer que toda su vida ha sido trabajadora y ha sido una buena madre ejemplar para sus hijos siendo un gran ejemplo para ellos. Luz de Maria es responsable, atenta, humilde pero con buenos deseos de superación su profesión es ganadera siendo esta una actividad económica que consiste en la crianza de animales para su aprovechamiento. Es así como día a día se gana la vida honradamente y nunca ha faltado el  pan en su hogar el desea comprar mas ganado vacas, toros y cabras y tambien  insumos agricolas puesto que posee cosecha de maiz y frjol y así comenzar a comercializar lo que les dan es por eso que solicita a INTEGRAL un préstamos para la compra de estos y espera contar con la ayuda ya que ya casi no tienen animales y quiere seguirle brindando mejores condiciones de vida a su familia.
texts.en: Luz de Maria lives together with her husband and their children in their own home. Thanks to God, she is a women who has been a hard worker and also an exemplary mother and great example for her children throughout her whole life. She is responsible, attentive, and humble, but with a good desire for self-improvement. Her profession is ranching, a financial activity that consists of raising animals for their use. This is how she honestly earns a living day-to-day and her home has never lacked enough food. She wants to buy more livestock such as cows, bulls, and goats. She also wants to buy agricultural supplies since she has a crop of corn and beans, and she wants to begin to sell what she grows. It's for this reason that she is requesting this loan from INTEGRAL to buy these things. She hopes to have the support because presently she hardly has any animals and she wants to continue providing her family with better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy more livestock such as cows, bulls, goats, and also agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Samuel

texts.en:
Ghanaian artisan Samuel specializes in making hand-carved African masks and sculptures. He would like to invest in the purchase of quality wood and paints, and also to cover labor costs.

Samuel has been selling through NOVICA since 2000. This is his story:

"I used to work as a messenger in a bank, but I realized I could do much better things with my life so I decided to go into arts, especially carving. I did not really undergo any actual training, but started carving bit by bit and sometimes sought help from my other colleagues. Sometimes I assisted them too. Eventually I became very skilled in carving and I then decided to settle for full time carving and depend solely on my own ideas to carve. Now I have assistants and I also train other carvers."

"Thanks to all of you for taking part in this microcredit. You encourage me to continue with my craft."

Use the link below to view Samuel's hand-carved wood art on the NOVICA site:
http://www.novica.com/kiva/2104

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of quality wood and paints, and also to cover labor costs.

loans.name: Lavrine

texts.en: Lavrine is 35 years old and lives in Paynesville in Montserrado County. She is married and her husband is a driver. They have three children aged between 11 months old and 10 years old. Two of the children are currently in school. For the past three years she has been selling rice, oil, pepper, vita and other goods in the local market. She makes a good profit and is getting more customers. Lavrine is requesting a loan to purchase more rice, oil, pepper, vita and other goods for her business. Her plans are to build a house and educate her children.

loans.use: to purchase more rice, oil, pepper, vita and other goods for her business.

loans.name: Yeah

texts.en:
Yeah is 25 years old and lives in the Paynesville area, one of the populated areas in Montserrado County. She is single and has two children, ages 5 and 7, both of whom are in school and live at home.

For the past three years, Yeah has been selling used clothes in the market. She makes a lot of profit and has more customers. 

She is requesting a loan to purchase more used clothes for her business. She hopes to become an international businesswoman and build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more used clothes for her business.

loans.name: Bendu

texts.en: Bendu, 26 years old, lives in Paynesville South, one of the populated areas in Montserrado County. She is single and has two children, 4 months and 5 years old, both living at home. For the past 2 years, Bendu has been running a restaurant in the local market. She started this business with a small amount of money received from her friend and learned this business from friends. Bendu is requesting a loan to purchase more pepper, oil, vita (a juice drink), rice, meat, fish, etc. for her business. Her plan is to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more pepper, oil, vita, rice, meat, fish, etc. for her business

loans.name: Nancy

texts.en: Nancy, 48 years old, lives in Paynesville, one of the populated areas in Montserrado County. She is married and has six children aged between 14 and 29 years old, living at home and attending school. For the past 3 years, Nancy has been operating a cook shop (restaurant) in the local market. She makes a lot of profit which helps her to send her children to school. Nancy is requesting a loan to purchase more rice, oil, pepper and coal for her business. She hopes to build a house and to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more rice, oil, pepper and coal for her business

loans.name: Hawah

texts.en: Hawah, 47 years old, lives in Paynesville, one of the populated areas in Montserrado County. She is married to a farmer and they have three children aged between 9 and 26 years old, in school and living at home. For the past thirteen years, Hawah has been selling soap, rice, toothpaste, oil, etc. in the local market. She makes a lot of profit and has many customers. Hawah is requesting a loan to purchase more soap, rice, toothpaste, oil, etc. for her business. Her plans are to build a house and to educate her children.

loans.use: to purchase more soap, rice, toothpaste, oil, etc. for her business

loans.name: Suzan

texts.en: Suzan is 30 years old, married, with four children living in Masindi, Uganda. She operates a poultry project and with the proceeds she has been able to pay the school fees for her children. Diseases and the high cost of feeds pose a challenge to her business. Her dream is to own at least 2000 birds by the end of this year. Suzan intends to use the loan to buy poultry feed.

loans.use: to buy poultry feed.

loans.name: Cecilia Concepcion

texts.es: Cecilia de 32 años de edad es una mujer muy emprendedora toda vida la han caracterizado por ser muy trabajadora honesta y visionaria. Actualemente habita junto a su familia su esposo y sus hijos, siendo estos su mayor fuente de inspiracion y dedicacion diaria. Cecilia siempre anda rebuscandose para que en su hogar nunca felte el pan de cada dia, posee una pequeña venta de ropa y por la tarde elabora y vende tamales pero su profesion es ser agricultora y cosecha maiz y frijol, jamas se cansa de ser trabajadora ya que desea mejorar su casa por ella y sus hijos es por eso que ha tomado la desicion de pedirle a INTEGRAL un prestamo para la compra de insumos agricolas como semillas, abonos, fertilizantes y pesticidas. Espera que la ayuda llegue a tiempo y seguir llevando el sustento diario a su hogar.
texts.en: Cecilia, 32, is a very enterprising woman; she’s been noted her entire life for being very hardworking, honest and forward-looking.  She currently lives with her family and children; they are her greatest source of inspiration and daily dedication.  Cecilia is always striving to insure that her home never lacks daily bread.  She has a small business selling clothes and in the evenings sells tamales but her occupation is being a farmer; she grows corn and beans.  She never tires of being a hard worker because she wants to improve her house for her children and herself and this is why she’s decided to ask INTEGRAL or a loan to buy farm supplies like seeds, manure, fertilizer and pesticide.  She hopes the help will arrive on time and to continue providing daily sustenance for her home.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies like seeds, manure, fertilizer and pesticide.

loans.name: Ricardo

texts.es: Ricardo de 60años de edad y habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su familia.  Ricardo  se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos como: maíz, frijoles siendo esta  su principal fuente de ingresos, Ha realizado esta actividad por mucho tiempo y es así como se gana la vida honradamente. Él es un hombre muy responsable, honesto y dedicado en su trabajo. Es muy conocido por sus vecinos los cuales dan buenas referencias de su trabajo como de su persona. Cada año repite está actividad ya que es una persona muy humilde y de escasos recursos el cual no puede tener   otro tipo de negocio o trabajo. Este año al igual que los anteriores ha decidido cultivar la tierra y ya que la temporada de siembra está cerca él quiere estar preparado con los  insumos agrícolas necesarios  para cosechar los principales granos básicos. Esta es la razón por la cual solicita este crédito a esta institución, INTEGRAL. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de insumos agrícolas como: semillas, abonos, insecticidas,  etc. y en el alquiler de una parcela donde tiene los principales cultivos. De esta forma espera lograr cultivar los principales granos básicos de este año para poder llevar el pan de cada día a su familia.
texts.en: Ricardo is 60 years old and lives in a home on his land together with his family. Ricardo grows basic grains such as corn and beans as his main source of income. He has done this activity for a long time and it is how he makes an honest living. He is a very responsible and honest man who is dedicated to his job. He is well-known by his neighbors who provide good references of his work and of himself. Every year he repeats this activity since he is a very humble person with scarce resources who could not have any other type of business or job. This year, just like the previous years, he has decided to farm, and since the sowing period is approaching, he wants to be prepared with the necessary agricultural supplies for harvesting the main basic grains. This is the reason why he is requesting this loan from INTEGRAL. He will use this loan to buy agricultural supplies such as seeds, fertilizers, and insecticides, and also to pay the rent for a land parcel where he has his main crops. In this manner, he hopes to succeed in growing the main basic grains this year in order to feed his family every day.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies such as seeds, fertilizers, and insecticides, and to pay the rent for a land parcel where he has his main crops.

loans.name: Al Hassane

texts.fr: Monsieur Al Hassane, marié, est âgé de 36 ans et père de 5 enfants. . Il habite la zone nord et est à son tout premier crédit à l’IMCEC qui vient de s’établir dans leur localité pour aider les populations les plus défavorisées. Il demande un crédit de 100000F CFA afin d’achever la construction de sa maison et avoir ou loger sa petite famille. Son plus grand souci est que les membres de sa famille puissent vivre dans les meilleures conditions possibles.
texts.en:
Al Hassane is 36 years old.  He is married and the father of five children.  He lives in the northern area, and this is his very first loan with the UIMCEC which has just opened a branch in his locality, in order to help the most underprivileged populations.

Al Hassane is requesting a loan of 100,000 CFA francs which will be used to finish building his house, therefore providing his small family with a place to live.  His main concern is for his family; he wants them to live in the best possible conditions.

loans.use: to finish building his house.

loans.name: Charles

texts.en: Charles lives in the town of Masindi in Uganda and has the responsibility for looking after four of his children. He has been operating a retail shop business for four years selling general merchandise. Charles’s business is located in a rural area, and his major customers are the local residents. He has hopes of expanding the business despite the challenge of stiff competition. Charles intends to use the loan to buy general merchandise such as sugar and salt to sell.

loans.use: to buy general merchandise such as sugar and salt to sell.

loans.name: Margret

texts.en: Margret is a 37-year-old married woman with four children living in Masindi, Uganda. Margret has a textile shop where she makes clothes and sells them. Her business is located on a busy street and her major customers are local residents and schools. She has high hopes of growing her business despite challenges of inadequate capital to meet the high demand. Margret intends to use the loan to buy clothes and uniforms to sell.

loans.use: to buy clothes and uniforms to sell.

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es: Mercedes, tiene 50 años de edad, es  medre soltera, tiene 4 hijos, vive en una aldea del municipio de Nueva  Frontera, Santa Bárbara.  Doña Mercedes lleva 9 años de tener su propio negocio de pulpería, vende productos de la canasta básica familiar como granos básicos, azúcar, leche, productos enlatados, refrescos, churros, harina, manteca etc. Ella ha decidido solicitar este préstamo por 22,000 lempiras para surtir y mejorar el inventario con la compra de más productos como carnes, refrescos, manteca, azúcar y otros, con el fin de tener variedad de productos que ofrecer a sus clientes. Tiene como meta convertir su pulpería en un mini súper  y  mandar a su hijo a estudiar a una universidad.
texts.en: Mercedes, 50, is a single mother of four children living in a village in the municipality of Nueva Frontera, Santa Bárbara.  She’s had her own grocery store business for nine years; she sells family staples like basic grains, sugar, milk, canned goods, soft-drinks, packaged snacks, flour, lard, etc.  She’s decided to request this 22,000 Lempira loan to stock up and improve her inventory in order to have a wider variety of products available for her customers.  Her goal is to turn her grocery store into a min supermarket and send her son to study in a university.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Wilbert Elias

texts.es: Wilbert , tiene 42 años de edad, casado, tiene 3 hijos, vive en el municipio de Quimistan, Santa Bárbara, con sus hijos y su esposa que se dedica a realizar trabajos de estilista.  El tiene su propio negocio de elaboración y venta de jugos naturales como ser de caña, naranja, agua de coco y otros. La venta la realiza de manera ambulante, cuenta con su propio vehículo que es una motocicleta, la que le permite desplazarse fácilmente ofreciendo su producto. El anteriormente trabajaba en una maquila y se decidió por su propio negocio. Esta solicitando un préstamo a ODEF por 6,000 Lempiras para comprar los insumos como frutas para extracción del jugo y vender.  Este préstamo le ayudara a que su negocio siga creciendo. Su meta es lograr reparar su casa para que su familia tenga un mejor estilo de vida.
texts.en: Wilbert, 42, is married and has three children; he lives in the municipality of Quimistan, Santa Bárbara with his children and wife who is a hair stylist.
