He has his own business making and selling natural fruit juices like sugarcane, orange, coconut water, etc.  He sells from place to place and has his own vehicle, a motorcycle, that makes it possible for him to sell his products from one place to another easily.  He used to work in an assembly plant and decided to start his own business.  He’s asking ODEF for a 6,000 Lempira loan to buy supplies like fruit to extract juice from to sell.  This loan will help his business continue to grow.  His goal is to repair his house so his family can have a better lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy fruit to make juice from to sell.

loans.name: Luis Emilio

texts.es: Luis, tiene 60 años de edad, esta separado con su esposa, tiene 6 hijos y reside en el municipio de Quimistan, Santa Bárbara. Don Luis tiene su propio negocio de venta de repuestos para bicicleta, motocicleta y moto taxis, como ser. Llantas, neumáticos, rines, aceites etc. El se dedicaba a prestar el servicio de motorista. Pero decidió por tener su propio negocio. Con el préstamo que solicita que es por 20,000 Lempiras, va surtir el negocio de repuestos para vender y ofrecer mayor variedad a sus clientes.  Su meta es seguir creciendo con el  negocio para seguir ayudando a  su familia.
texts.en: Luis, 60, is separated from his wife; he has six children and lives in the municipality of Quimistan, Santa Bárbara.  Luis has his own business selling spare parts like tires, inner tubes, wheel rims, lubricants, etc. for bicycles, motorcycles and mototaxis.  He used to work as a taxi driver but decided to start his own business.  He’s asking for a 20,000 Lempira loan to stock his shop with spare parts to sell and to provide wider variety to his customers.  His goal is to continue growing with the business to continue supporting his family.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for bicycles, motorcycles and mototaxis.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy vegetables

loans.name: Mardoqueo

texts.es: Don Mardoqueo, de 63 años de edad, casado, vive con su esposa y una hija en el municipio de Nueva Frontera, Santa Bárbara. El tiene aproximadamente 25 años de dedicarse a la agricultura. Produce café, maíz y frijoles. La producción la vende e el mercado local. El préstamo que solicita es el segundo con ODEF y es por 25,000 Lempiras, con el cual va comprar fertilizantes, pago de limpieza, preparación de tierra y pago de corte de cultivos. El espera que con este mantenimiento poder sacar buenos cultivos. Tiene como meta familiar construir una casa a su hija y comprar un vehículo que le sirva para transportarse a la finca.
texts.en: Mardoqueo, 63, is married living with his wife and daughter in the municipality of Nueva Frontera, Santa Bárbara.  He’s been working in agriculture for about 25 years growing coffee, corn and beans.  He sells his crops in the local market.  The loan he’s asking ODEF for is his second one and is for 25,000 Lempiras he’ll use to buy fertilizer, to pay for the weeding and soil preparation and to pay to harvesting the crops.  He hopes this maintenance will lead to good crop yields.  His family goal is to build his daughter a house and to buy a vehicle he can use for transportation to the farm.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies, to do the weeding, to prepare the soil and to pick coffee.

loans.name: Raquel De Los Angeles

texts.es: La joven  Raquel  lucha al lado de su esposo quien continua trabajando como taxista, para apoyar a sus dos hijos menores de 15 años con los ingresos de su pequeño negocio de librería se ha ayudado para los gastos de estudios de sus hijos, ella solicita un quinto crédito para cambiar el techo que está en muy malas condiciones y ahora que se acerca el invierno desea prepararse para estar cómoda en su vivienda así como también le pondrá cerámica al piso de la sala para ver bonita su vivienda para ello necesita comprar laminas de zinc, perlines, ceramica, cemento, entre otros.
texts.en:
Raquel is a young woman who, along with her husband, who still works as a taxi driver, strives to support their two children, with the income from her small bookstore business. Her children are under 15, and this has helped her with her their school expenses.

She is applying for her fifth loan, in order to replace the roof, which is in very poor condition. Now that winter is approaching, she wishes to get ready so that they can be comfortable in their home. She will also install tile on the floor of the main room, so that the home looks nice. For this, she needs to buy sheet metal roofing, perlins, tile, cement and other items.

loans.use: To buy sheet metal roofing, perlins, tile, cement and other items.

loans.name: Pedro Alfonso

texts.es:
En el cálido distrito de Santiago, Ica, Perú; vive Pedro, un hombre de 47 años de edad, padre de un pequeño de 11 años y por el cual cada día sale a trabajar para poder ofrecerle y una vida digna y poder solventar los gastos su hogar. Pedro debido a los pocos recursos económicos que tenían sus padres, solo llego a estudiar hasta el quinto grado de educación secundaria, es por ello que desde muy joven es muy trabajador.

Cada día, Pedro trabaja en su negocio de planchado de autos, en el cual labora alrededor de 10 horas al día y puede atender hasta 15 clientes diariamente; él cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es amable con sus clientes y sobre todo porque es honrado y puntual en su trabajo.

Pedro está muy contento y agradecido con el apoyo que le brindan los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar herramientas como llaves stilson, alicates, sopletes, latex, entre otros y así podrá tener los materiales necesarios para poder realizar su trabajo y también poder mejorar la atención a sus clientes y con ello seguir luchando por hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener un local propio para su taller y poder darle a su hijo una buena profesión”.
texts.en:
In the hot district of Santiago, Ica, Peru, lives Pedro, 47.  He’s the father of a little 11-year-old and he goes out daily to work in order to offer him a proper life and to be able to cover household expenses.  Because of the limited economic resources his family had, Pedro was only able to study up to fifth year of secondary school which is why he’s been a very hard worker since he was very young.

Pedro works every day in his auto body shop; he works about 10 hours daily and can take care of up to 15 customers per day.  He believes he does well in his business because he’s kind to his customers and above all because he’s honest and punctual with his work.

Pedro’s very happy and grateful for the support Kiva lenders provide him because thanks to the help he’s been given he will be able to buy tools like Stillson wrenches, pliers, soldering guns and latex, among others, thus having materials on hand needed to do his work and improve customer service.  With this, he will continue striving to make his greatest dream reality: to have a space of his own for his workshop and to be able to give his son a good profession.

loans.use: to buy tools.

loans.name: Yesika Leonor

texts.es:
La Señora Yesika Leonor  es originaria del municipio de san Rafael del sur, su actividad comercial es venta de perfumes para dama, caballero y cosméticos, lo comercializa visitando a sus clientes en su casa de habitación para ofrecerles el producto y si el cliente le gusta se lo compra y se lo pagan en cuotas quincenales o mensuales según su forma de recibir sus pagos los clientes.

Es madre soltera, tiene dos hijas menores de edad una en edad escolar.

El dinero lo solicita para la compra de ladrillo, cemento y otra parte para la compra de perfumenes.
Me siento muy bien trabajar con ustedes gracias a Ceprodel y kiva he podido salir adelante con mis hijas.
texts.en: Yesika Leonor is from the municipality of San Rafael del Sur and her commercial activity is selling perfume for women and men and cosmetics.  She sells them visiting her customers at home to offer the products and if the customer likes them they buy from her and pay her in biweekly or monthly payments according to their payment plans.  She’s a single mother of two minor daughters one of whom is school age.  She needs the money to buy bricks and cement and part of it to buy perfume.  She says she feels very good working with you because thanks to Ceprodel and to KIVA she’s been able to move forward with her daughters.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement and Avon perfume.

loans.name: Arame

texts.fr:
Madame Arame est une dame de 61 ans qui gère une cantine de vente de tissus depuis 20 ans déjà. Malgré son âge, elle s’active pour s’occuper et ne pas rester sédentaire. Elle n’avait encore jusque là pas fait de crédit et désire un montant de 200000 F CFA  pour acheter de nouvelles marchandises et exposer dans sa boutique. Madame n’a pas de charges sinon ses propres besoins. Elle commence sa journée à 7 h du matin pour la terminer à 18 h du soir.
Avec le crédit, elle pourra diversifier ses produits et services et satisfaire sa clientèle.
Comme projets futurs elle désire ouvrir une boutique de produits cosmétiques et acheter  des machines à coudre.
texts.en:
Arame is a 61-year-old woman who has been running a stall and selling fabrics for 20 years already.  In spite of her age, she is busy and active and does not want to be idle.  She has never asked for a loan before.  She is now requesting 200,000 CFA francs for the purchase of new products to be displayed in her booth.  

Arame has no other expenses than those related to her own needs.  She works from 7 AM until 6 PM.  

With this loan, she will be able to diversify her products and services, and to meet her customers' needs.  In the future, she would like to open a shop and sell cosmetic products.  She would also like to purchase some sewing machines.

loans.use: to buy a variety of fabrics to stock up her booth and resell.

loans.name: Cliver

texts.es:
El señor Cliver tiene 31 años de edad, vive en cuarto alquilado, en el Barrio la Tablada. Su principal actividad del cliente es brindar servicio de transporte público en la Ciudad de Monteagudo en su taxi, su horario de trabajo comienza desde las 5:30 AM. y termina alrededor de las 11:00 PM.                                                                                                                                                                                                        
El diario vivir del señor Cliver es muy agotador ya que trabaja más de ocho horas por día, el lucha día a día para llegar a tener un futuro mejor.
Cliver es soltero, razón por la cual trabaja arduamente para cubrir los gastos de alquiler de su cuarto, alimentación, vestimenta y otros gastos varios.                                                                                                                                                                                              
Está solicitando crédito para comprar las llantas de su vehículo ya que actualmente se encuentra muy depreciada o gastada y así poder seguir trabajando con su vehículo, por lo consiguiente seguir generando mayores ingresos para tener una mejor condición de vida.
texts.en:
Cliver, 31, lives in a rented room in the Tablada neighborhood.  His main activity is providing public transportation services in his taxi in the city of Monteagudo.  His work day starts at 5:30am and ends around 11pm.  Cliver’s daily routine is quite exhausting since he works more than 8 hours daily; he strives daily to attain a better future.

Cliver is single and works hard to be able to pay for renting his room, for food, clothing and other expenses.  He’s asking for this loan to buy tires for his vehicle because they are currently quite worn down so he can continue working with his vehicle and generating higher income for better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy tires.

loans.name: El Sembrador Group

texts.es:
La señora Paulina esta casada, tiene 35 años de edad, cursó los 5 años de educación primaria, tiene 2 hijos de los cales ninguno esta estudiando, se dedica a la atención  a una tienda en  general, inicio este negocio con poco capital, hasta ahora lleva  7 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien se dedica al mismo trabajo.

Organiza un grupos para poder solicitar un prestamos que lo utilizara para  la compra de productos para su tienda, gaseosas,  jugos, golosinas, lácteos, energizantes, embutidos, etc. espera en el futuro tener un negocio  amplio y la mas grande de su localidad,  y muchos clientes. Las demás integrantes del grupos se dedican al comercio, agricultura, y a la atención a tienda en  general.
texts.en:
Paulina’s married.  She’s 35-years-old and completed fifth grade in elementary school.  She has two children neither of which is attending school.  She has a general store that she started with very little capital.  To date, she has 7 years’ experience and has her husband’s support; he’s in the same business.

She organized a group to request a loan to buy stock merchandise like soft-drinks, snacks, dairy products, energy drinks, canned goods, etc. to stock her store.  She hopes in future to have a bigger store that’s the largest in her location with many customers.  The other group members work in agriculture, commerce and have general stores.

loans.use: to buy stock  merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Rosa Francisca

texts.es:
Rosa es una mujer casada con mucha voluntad de salir adelante junto a su esposo y sus 3 hijos han sabido trabajar la tierra en la siembra y cultivo de maíz, frijoles y arroz. ademas de trabajar la tierra también tiene un pequeño negocio de venta de lácteos la cual elabora comprando leche y sacando algunos de sus derivados como ser cuajada y mantequilla en pequeña escala que es vendido a sus vecinos y amigos, ella no pudo estudiar ya que sus padres eran de bajos recursos; pero pudo cursar hasta el cuarto grado en la primaria; ella se siente orgullosa de tener un conocimiento básico el cual le ayuda para poder leer y escribir lo cual agradece a sus padres el esfuerzo ademas de su trabajo ya que fue heredado por ellos, le enseñaron como trabajar la tierra y las técnicas para poder sembrar y cultivar ya que ella se dedica al cultivo hace mas de 20 años ahora cuenta con un pequeño terreno el cual es propio, fruto de su esfuerzo y trabajo junto a su esposo y familia.    

Rosa actualmente solicita ayuda para poder comprar semilla, fertilizantes y la parte de mecanización para poder seguir trabajando en la siembra y cultivo de maíz, frijoles y arroz para poder seguir ayudando a su esposo con los gastos en el hogar y otras necesidades que a diario se presentan como vestimenta, educación, medicina, alimentación, entre otros ya que la agricultura es el único sustento para ella y su familia.
  
Su sueño es poder hacer crecer su negocio ayudando a su esposo a extenderse a otros lugares para que puedan tener mayores ingresos y poder darle a sus hijos una mejor educación, para que esa sea la mejor herramienta y la puedan utilizar para obtener buenos empleos, un mejor estilo de vida y se puedan superar y así puedan cumplir también sus sueños
texts.en:
Rosa is a married woman with a great will to get ahead. She, together with her husband and three children, has known how to work the land planting and cultivating corn, beans, and rice. In addition to working the land, she also has a small business selling dairy products. She makes these by purchasing milk and producing by-products, such as cheese curd and butter, on a small scale. She then sells these to her neighbors and friends. 

She was not able to study as her parents had limited resources, however, she was able to complete the fourth grade in primary school. She is proud of the fact that she has some basics, which has helped her to be able to read and write. She is grateful to her parents for their efforts in addition to the work they did because she inherited it from them. They taught her how to work the land as well as methods for planting and cultivation and she has made a living farming for more than 20 years now. She has her own small plot of land, which is a result of her work and effort, together with her husband and family. 

Currently, Rosa is requesting help to be able to buy seeds, fertilizers and for some mechanization to be able to continue working planting and cultivating corn, beans, and rice. This will allow her to continue helping her husband with the household expenses and other necessities that come up on a daily basis like clothing, school, medicine, and food, among others. Farming is the only means of support for her and her family. 

Her dream is to be able to make her business grow, helping her husband to expand to other areas so that they can make a better income. This will allow them to give their children a better education, which is the greatest tool, and they can use it to get good jobs, have a better quality of life, and will be able to get ahead. This way, they too will be able to achieve their dreams.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, and for farming mechanization to plant corn, beans, and rice.

loans.name: Lucio

texts.es:
Lucio, se decidió por un nuevo préstamo, porque el usar prestamos le ha ayudado para mejorar sus cosechas en la agricultura y en la crianza de ganado, él pagara una maquina desgranadora para poder procesar la cosecha, tambien pagara por alquiler de maquina picadora de zacate para moler el zacate de la cosecha para alimento del ganado, tambien comercializar alguna parte. 
El considera que el préstamo anterior le ayudo a que sus siembras fueran más beneficiosas, incrementando la producción, en este periodo ha invertido en la ganadería, por eso sus condiciones de vida tanto en la familia como personalmente esta mejor.
texts.en:
Lucio has decided on a new loan because the use of the loan has helped him improve his harvest in farming and cattle raising. He will pay for a hulling machine in order to be able to process the crop, also he will pay to rent a mowing machine to grind up the grass of the harvest for cattle feed, and also to sell some of it.

He thinks the last loan helped him as his crops were more profitable, increasing the harvest. During this period he has invested in livestock, and because of this the quality of life for the family as well as personally is better.

loans.use: to pay for a hulling machine and a mowing machine

loans.name: Kitumaini Group

texts.fr: Kusinza est une femme dynamique et entrepreneur. Agee de 42 ans, mère de 6 enfants tous scolarisés est mariée à un homme sans emploi. Elle exerce son activité dans la rue par manque de table d’étalage au marché central de la ville. Les bénéfices de ses affaires lui servent pour l’épargne et la scolarité de ses enfants. Ce nouveau credit servira à s’approvisionner en 12 nouveaux sacs de braise. Son vouloir est d'agrandir son entreprise afin d'assurer une bonne survie à sa famille. Ainsi, la cliente remercie Hekima et ses partenaires.
texts.en:
Kusinza is a dynamic 42-year-old entrepreneur.  She is the mother of six children who all go to school.  Her husband is unemployed.  For lack of display tables at the central market of her town, she works in the street.  With the profits from her business, she is able to save some money and cover her children's school fees.

Kusinza will use this new loan to buy 12 new bags of coal.  She wants to expand her business in order to provide a good life for her family.  She thanks Hekima and its partners.

loans.use: to buy 12 bags of coal.

location.country: The Democratic Republic of the Congo

loans.name: Las Gardenias Group

texts.es:
Este es el grupo “Las Gardenias” conformado por 06 socios responsables que pasan a su décimo ciclo, la gran mayoría de ellos son vecinos de la zona. A sus 53 años Elea  ha llegado a cumplir algunos de sus metas como construir parte de  su vivienda y mantener su  negocio de comida. Actualmente cuenta con un restaurante la cual brinda almuerzo y cena. Comenzó este negocio con la idea de poder sacar adelante a sus 02 hijos, pues era el único sustento de su hogar. Su mayor deseo es poner su restaurante en su propia casa y seguir apoyando a su menor hija que aún depende de ella en sus estudios.
El crédito solicitado lo destinará para la compra de insumos, mesas y de esta manera brindarles una mejor atención a sus comensales. El grupo está agradecido con los apoyos brindados de los inversionistas Kiva.
Elea se encuentra en la parte posterior es la segunda del lado izquierdo.  En la fotografía están presente 02 socias pasivas lo cual se reintegrarán con su grupo en el siguiente ciclo; una de ellas es Ernestina que lleva bolsa a cuadros y Ana que está ubicada en la misma fila pero al final del lado izquierdo.
texts.en:
This is the communal bank "Las Gardenias."  The group has 6 responsible members who are in their 10th loan cycle.  Most of the members are neighbors from the area.  At the age of 53, Elea has already accomplished some of her goals, such as building part of her home and keeping her food business running.  She now has a restaurant where she serves lunch and dinner.  She started this business with the idea of providing for her 2 children, as she was the only breadwinner in the home.  Elea's main wish is to set up a restaurant in her own home and continue to support her youngest daughter, who is still a dependent, in her education.

Elea is requesting a loan to buy supplies and tables, so that she can provide better service to her customers.  This group is grateful for the support being provided by the Kiva lenders.  

Elea is seen in the rear of the photo, second from the left.   In the photograph 2 passive members are seen; they will return to the group in the next loan cycle.  One of these is Ernestina, who carries a polka dot purse, and the other is Ana, who is in the same row but is at the end on the left side.

loans.use: to buy supplies and tables

loans.name: Mahsuda

texts.ru:
Махсуда очень трудолюбивая и добрая женщина.  Она замужем и имеет детей. Она живет в селе и занимается откормом и разведением мелко рогатого и крупно рогатого скота. Этот бизнес у них семейный,ее муж занимается куплей продажей скота,каждое воскресенье  выводит скот на рынок и перепродает. Так как они живут в сельской местности животноводство является главным источником дохода,поэтому Махсуда и ее семья стараются развивать этот бизнес. 
  На полученный кредит Махсуда хочет купить несколько голов скота и увеличить свое стадо. Она заранее благодарит организацию Кива за финансовую поддержку.
texts.en:
Mahsuda is a very hardworking and kind woman.  She is married and has a family.  She lives in a village and is involved in animal husbandry, raising and feeding small livestock as well as cattle.  This is a family business: her husband goes to the market every Sunday to buy and sell livestock.  Since the family lives in a rural setting, animal husbandry is their main source of income.  This is why Mahsuda and her family are trying to develop their business. 

With the loan that she has received, Mahsuda wants to buy some livestock and expand her herd.  She thanks Kiva in advance for its financial support.

loans.use: to purchase livestock.

loans.name: Abrahatsiyone

texts.en:
Abrahatsiyone is originally from Eritrea, in East Africa. She is a mother of four children. Abrahatsiyone has been operating a food truck in the DC metro area for the past 23 years, primarily selling hot dogs, chips, snacks, drinks, and a few Ethiopian food items such as injera, a traditional handmade bread. 

Last year Abrahatsiyone began observing that her customers were requesting healthier food options. The size of her existing food truck limited Abrahatsiyone’s ability to offer more variety in her menu, like Ethiopian or Eritrean food and salads and soups. 

Abrahatsiyone decided that she needed to purchase a larger food truck to meet the requests of her customers. The total cost of the food truck is $20,000. Abrahatsiyone personally invested her own $10,000, and a loan of $10,000 will help her cover the entire cost of the new food truck.

Until recently, Abrahatsiyone operated the business entirely on her own. She realized that she could use some assistance to stock and set up her inventory in the food truck. When a homeless man visited the truck asking for food, Abrahatsiyone offered him a part-time job.

loans.use: to purchase a new food truck to expand her business in the DC metro area.

loans.name: Las Talentosas Group

texts.es: Cordiales Saludos. Este el grupo “Las Talentosas”  conformado por 08 socios, cada uno de ellos con distintas actividades comerciales. Virginia de 33 años casada con 01 hijo menor de edad. Con los deseos de surgir y mejorar su economía Virginia emprende  su negocio, la cual hace mas  de 04 meses brinda servicios de  fotocopias. Gracias a su esfuerzo ha conseguido apoyar a su pareja con algunos gastos del hogar.  Su siguiente meta es de instalar una bodega, pues así asegura ella tendrá mayores ganancias. Su último crédito lo destinó para la compra de papeles y tintas para la fotocopiadora. El grupo “Las Talentosas” agradecen el crédito brindado ya que permite su progreso. Virginia es la primera del lado derecho viste polo negro y pantalón azul. En la parte superior esta Ilmer, pues  no pudo llegar a tiempo por motivo de trabajo.
texts.en:
Cordial greetings! This is "The Gifted" group, made up of 8 members, each of which is involved in a different business activity. 

Virginia is 33 years old, married, and has one young child. Because of the desire to develop and improve her income, Virginia launched her business and has been providing photocopy service for the last four months. Thanks to her effort, she has gotten the support of her partner with some of the household expenses. Her next goal is to open a store and in this way she will have more earnings. This loan will be used for the purchase of paper and ink for photocopying. 

The group "The Gifted" is grateful for the credit provided which has allowed them to get ahead. 

In the photo, Virginia is one the far right wearing a black shirt and blue pants. On the upper left is Ilmer who could not be present for the photo because she was working.

loans.use: to buy paper and ink for photocopying

loans.name: Jumwa's Group

texts.en: Jumwa is a small-scale farmer of cowpeas, cassava and maize. She is raising her seven children on her own, as her husband has passed away. Jumwa wants to be a KOMAZA tree farmer because she says she "heard that this was a project that could change my life and my family. If the trees are well grown, I hope to get money out of the sale of the trees and have a good home and a milk cow." She wants to build a permanent house and begin a poultry keeping business. Jumwa says, "My favorite part [of the KOMAZA program] is tree planting and learning how to do it on my own." She remarked that she appreciates what KOMAZA is doing.

loans.use: to purchase eucalyptus seedlings and fertilizer and pay for technical training and plantation maintenance support

loans.name: Tsuma's Group

texts.en: Tsuma is a 37-year-old agriculture and butterfly farmer. He and his wife, who is also a farmer, have two children. Tsuma's major challenge in his farming is the shortage of rainfall. He joined the KOMAZA microforestry program because "agro-forest improves rainfall scarcity and improves the nature of the surroundings." When Tsuma realizes profits from his tree farm, he says, "I hope to educate [my] children, construct a good house and improve the diet for the family." He appreciates the support KOMAZA provides with inputs, seedlings and trainings, as well as working with other farmers.

loans.use: to purchase tree farm inputs such as eucalyptus seedlings and fertilizer and pay for technical trainings and maintenance support

loans.name: Secundino Antonio

texts.es: Don Secundino es un cliente que lleva 14 créditos consecutivos, un hombre muy trabajador que lucha y sale adelante ayudando a su familia, sus hijos ya son grandes independientes la esposa se encarga de poner el orden en el hogar mientras don Secundino labora como vigilante, este crédito lo solicita para terminar de construir un cuarto que dejo sin concluir necesita comprar cemento, bloques, arena, hierro para concluir su objetivo de darle más espacio y comodidad a su hogar para el bienestar de la familia.
texts.en: Don Secundino is a client who has had 14 consecutive loans.  He is a hard-working man who strives to help his family get ahead.  His children are already grown and independent.  His wife is in charge of keeping the house in order while Don Secundino works as a guard.  He is requesting this loan to finish constructing a room that he has been waiting to complete.  He needs to purchase cement, blocks, sand, and iron to complete his goal of creating more space and comfort in his home for the well-being of his family.

loans.use: to purchase cement, blocks, sand, and iron.

loans.name: Nargisa

texts.ru:
Наргиса женщина в возрасте 30 лет. Замужем, имеет 3 детей.  Она  с мужом    более  9 лет занимается  откормом скота.   В наличии имеет около 5 голов мелко рогатого скота.  Наргиса  содержит скот у себя дома и она  очень хорошо разбирается в преимуществах своего дела, знает когда закупать и продавать скот. Также они имеют доход  от выращивание сельхоз культур. Но основной доход от животноводство.   Дети  пока  учатся в школе. Они оба стараются копить деньги и обеспечить своим детям светлое будущее. 
 Для расширения бизнеса Наргиса обратилась в организацию Арванд за финансовой помощью и надеется,что ей помогут. Она вместе с мужем заранее выражает свою благодарность этой организации.
texts.en:
Nargisa is 30 years old.  She is married and has three children.  She and her husband have been involved in feeding cattle for more than nine years, and they now have about five head of small livestock.  Nargisa keeps her livestock at home and handles all aspects of the business very well, knowing precisely when to buy and sell livestock.  The family also earns an income from growing crops, but their main income comes from animal husbandry.  

The couple's children are still in school, and Nargisa and her husband try hard to save enough money to provide them with a bright future. 

Eager to expand her business, Nargisa has turned to MDO Arvand to receive some financial assistance, and she is relying on this support.  Nargisa and her husband express their gratitude in advance toward this organization.

loans.use: to purchase livestock.

loans.name: Champa

texts.en: Champa is 44 years old.  She is widowed and resides with four children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia.  She is a housekeeper.  Two of her children are employed and earn $7 every day.  Champa is requesting a loan of $1000 to purchase construction materials to build a new house.  This money helps her build a comfortable house and provide better living conditions for her family.  In the future, she would like to run a grocery store at home and help her children earn bachelor’s degrees.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials to build a new house

loans.name: Bella

texts.en:
As a married parent of 2 children, Bella works hard to support her family.

She has an electronics repair business in the Philippines.  Bella is borrowing PHP 25000 through NWTF to buy supplies for her electronic repair shop.

Bella has been sustaining her business activities through 19 loans from NWTF in the past, and more recently, through Kiva.  She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream, to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her electronic repair shop.

loans.name: Toji

texts.ru:
Тоджи   пожелой мужчина  в возрасте 52 лет . Он проживает в посёлке. Тоджи  женат, имеет одного ребёнка. Его жена занимаются домашним хозяйством. Тоджи более 20 лет  занимается купля - продажей мелко рогатого скота. Он знает все преимущество этого бизнеса. Также он занимается выращиванием овощей такие как картофель, морковь и лук.  Но эти овощи они выращивают для себя чтобы не покупать на рынке у них все со своего  огорода. Основным и единственным доходом является выращивание скота который дает не плохой доход. 
Тоджи планирует купить несколько овец и до весны  откормить их и продать по выгодной цене.  Очень надеется на финансовую поддержку  и понимание от организации Кива и заранее благодарит.
texts.en:
Toji is a middle-aged man who is now 52 years old.  He is married, has one child, and lives in a rural setting.  His wife takes care of the household.  He has been buying and selling small livestock for more than 20 years and knows all aspects of this business very well. 

Toji also grows vegetables such as potatoes, carrots and onions for the family's own consumption.  He gets everything he needs from his own garden and does not need to buy produce at the market.

Toji's only source of income is his animal husbandry business, and his earnings from this business are not bad.

Toji is planning to buy a few sheep.  He will fatten them before the spring and then resell them for a profit.  He is relying on Kiva's understanding and financial support and thanks this organization in advance.

loans.use: to purchase sheep.

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.en:
Cecelia is married and works hard to support her family.

She has a plastic wares retail business in the Philippines. Cecelia is borrowing PHP 15000 through NWTF to purchase more plastic wares for resale.

Cecelia has been sustaining her business activities through 19 loans from NWTF in the past and more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more plastic wares for resell.

loans.name: Dominga

texts.en:
Dominga is married and works hard to support her family.

Dominga is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Dominga requested a PHP 15000 loan through NWTF to purchase medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

Dominga has been raising pigs for four years, and has borrowed 18 times in the past from NWTF and more recently, from Kiva.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money to buy a rice mill for her business.

loans.use: to purchase medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es: Juan vive junto  a su familia su esposa y sus hijos. Es un hombre visionario que siempre se ha caracterizado por ser un hijo, un padre y esposo ejemplar  que sus deseos de superación siempre han sido altos, siendo responsable, honesto, humilde, trabajador y muy emprendedor. Se dedica al cultivo de chile y granos basicos, esta es su principal fuente de ingreso desde hace varios años se ha dedicado a esta actividad y lo hace con esfuerzo y dedicación. Juan desea comprar insumos para seguir comercializando sus productos y que no se le arruinen por no tener lo necesario para cultivarlos es por eso que ha tomado la iniciativa de acercarse a INTEGRAL  para solicitar un crédito y comprar insumos como: Abonos, Fertilizantes, Pesticidas u otros. Espera que la ayuda que solicita se le sea dada ya que cuenta con buenas referencias de pagos y espera saldar la deuda antes de lo previsto.
texts.en:
Juan lives with his family, comprised of his wife and children.  He is a visionary man who has always been known as an exemplary son, father, and husband.  He has always had a strong desire to succeed, and he is responsible, honest, humble, hardworking, and very enterprising.  Juan cultivates peppers and staple grains.  This is been his main source of income.  He's been cultivating these crops for a number of years, and he does it with hard work and dedication. 

Juan wants to buy agricultural supplies so he can continue to sell his products, and so that his crops will not fail due to the lack of farming inputs.  For this reason, he has taken the initiative to approach INTEGRAL to request a loan.  He will use the loan to buy supplies such as: organic fertilizers, chemical fertilizers, pesticides, and other supplies.  He hopes to receive the assistance that he is requesting, because he has good payment references and he expects to pay off the loan ahead of schedule.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies such as: organic fertilizers, chemical fertilizers, pesticides, and other supplies

loans.name: Elma

texts.en:
As a widowed parent of eight children, Elma works hard to support her family.

She runs a general store business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from farming rice.  Elma is borrowing PHP 15000 through NWTF to buy more groceries to sell to customers.

Elma has been sustaining her business activities through her past 22 loans from NWTF and more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Janice

texts.en:
Janice is from Ozamis City, Misamis Occidental. She is 27 years old. Janice is married and has three children. She owns and operates a motorcycle transport business. She has been engaged in her business for 3 years and earns 4,700PHP a month.

Janice is requesting a loan of 6,000PHP, which will be used to repair her motorcycle so she can offer better service. She plans to use the additional revenue to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to repair her motorcycle so she can offer better transport service.

loans.name: Kimly

texts.en:
Kimly is 46 years old. She is married and resides with one child in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She has been selling vegetables for more than seven years, earning approximately $4 daily. Her husband is a soldier who makes an income of $3 each day. 

Due to a lack of funds, Kimly requests a loan of $1,000 to purchase construction materials to finish building her house. This money will help her provide better living conditions for the family. In the future, she would like to expand the business and send her child to a good school.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials to finish building her house.

loans.name: Teodisia

texts.en:
Teodisia is 57 years old and married with three children. She lives in Clarin, Misamis Occidental. She plants and harvests bananas for sale in her local community. She has been three years in this business. Each month, she earns 8,500 Philippines pesos (PHP) doing this type of business. 

She requested a loan of 10,000 PHP to purchase fertilizer such as manure and seedlings. In 2019, she became a member of GDMPC. In the future, she wants to make improvements to her house and to have a better future.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer such as manure and seedlings.

loans.name: Jennie

texts.en:
Jennie is married and works hard to support her family.

She runs a general store business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from rice retailing. Jennie is borrowing 25,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) through NWTF to buy more grocery products to sell to customers.

Jennie has been sustaining her business activities through her past eight loans from NWTF and more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more grocery products to sell.

loans.name: Jovelene

texts.en: Jovelene is a 26 years old, married with one child.  She lives in Clarin, Misamis Occidental.  She has been operating a motorcycle transport business, earning 6,500PHP every month.  She is requesting a loan of 8,000PHP to purchase spare parts.  She joined GDMPC in the year 2011. In the future, she hopes to improve her general living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts.

loans.name: Eveleyn

texts.en: Evelyn is a 49 years old, married with three children.  She lives in Clarin, Misamis Occidental.  She owns and operates farm land, planting and harvesting bananas for sale to earn a living.  She has been farming for over seven years and she earns of 7,600PHP every month.  She requested a loan of 9,500PHP to purchase additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to raise. She wants to expand her business one day and to have a better future.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings & young crops to raise

loans.name: Eleanor

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Eleanor works hard to support her family.

She has a general store in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from farming rice.  Eleanor is borrowing PHP 25000 through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell at her general store.

Eleanor has been sustaining her business activities through her past 22 loans from NWTF and more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell.

loans.name: Vilma

texts.en: Vilma is married and a mother of seven adult-aged dependents.  She is 45 years old and lives in Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines.  She grows bananas and harvests coconuts to earn a living.  She has been doing this for 15 years and earns approximately PHP 13,000 every month.  She has requested a loan of PHP 14,000 at GDMPC to purchase fertilizer such as manure and seedlings. . Vilma has been a member of GDMPC since year 2008. In the future, Vilma hopes to gain more profit and have a better future.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer such as manure and seedlings.

loans.name: Tulihano Group

texts.fr: La cliente  Sakina est une femme courageuse. Agée de 47 ans, membre du groupe de crédit Tulihano est mariée à un homme d’affaire.  Elle avait débuté  son activité  en 2009 avec 3 cartons de savon  financé par son mari et en 2010 elle a adhéré au crédit de Hekima. Ce crédit sollicité va  lui permettre  de s’approvisionner  en divers produis vivriers (dont la farine de manioc,1 sac de riz, 10 litres d'huile végétale, 1 sac de sucre et 1 carton de savon). Elle remercie Hekima et prie Dieu de le bénir d’avantage.
texts.en: This client, by the name of Sakina, is a courageous woman. She is 47 years old, a member of the Tulihano loan group and married to an entrepreneur. She launched her business in 2009 with three boxes of soap financed by her husband, and in 2010 she joined the Hekima loan program. This loan will allow her to stock up on various staple  products (such as manioc [cassava] flour, one bag of rice, 10 liters of vegetable oil, one bag of sugar and one box of soap). She thanks Hekima and prays to God for continuous blessings.

loans.use: to stock up on various staple products (such as manioc [cassava] flour, one bag of rice, 10 liters of vegetable oil, one bag of sugar and one box of soap)

location.country: The Democratic Republic of the Congo

loans.name: Maria Hilda

texts.es: María Hilda vive junto a su compañero de vida en casa propia, ella se dedica a la a la venta de floristería en variedad decoran arcos para bodas y otras ocasiones, ya tiene varios años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia en la venta lo que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, es muy conocida pues tiene un don especial para la decoración y un gusto excelente para las flores se ha hecho de mucha clientela que la prefiere por la calidad de las flores, los buenos precios y además por el excelente servicio; María es una mujer activa, dedicada a su labor, con muchas ganas de salir adelante, siempre esta a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades que le permitan alcanzar el éxito, todos los días se esfuerza al máximo porque sabe que solo así lograra su objetivo, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda y quiere aprovechar para realizar una nueva inversión, pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar flores, arcos, material de decoración etc. María Hilda tiene buenas referencias de pago y es responsable asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez confía que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Hilda Maria lives with her life partner in her own house. She works as a florist in shop selling a variety of arrangements for weddings and other occasions. She has been in this business for many years, and that has given her lots of sales experience which helps her earn a higher income. She is well known for having a special talent for decorating and excellent taste in flowers. Many customers prefer her because of the quality of the flowers, the good prices, and also the excellent customer service. Maria is an active woman, dedicated to her work, and very eager to get ahead.  She’s always looking for new opportunities that will bring her success. Every day she works her hardest because she knows that only that way will she achieve her dream. In the last weeks, demand has increased, and she wants to be able to make a new investment. However she needs money, and for that reason she’s asking Integral for a loan to buy flowers, bows, decorating material, etc. Maria Hilda has good references, and she’s responsible. She says that she will be able to pay off the debt, and she has confidence that she will give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy flowers, bows, and decorating material.

loans.name: Nelie

texts.en: Nelie is a 64-year-old widow with three children. She lives in Clarin, Misamis Occidental. Nelie is a farmer, and she owns a plot of land where her coconut and banana trees are planted. She has been doing this for 20 years, and every month she earns 4,500 PHP from this work. She has requested a loan of 5,000 PHP to purchase farm chemicals. Nelie has been a member of GDMPC for 6 years. Nelie hopes to have a better future.

loans.use: to purchase farm chemicals for her coconut and banana trees.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: make improvements on the walls and floors of his home.

loans.name: Handsuren

texts.en: Handsuren is 26 years old and lives with her husband and son in Ger, located in the Govi-Altai province of Mongolia. Her husband, Nergui, works at a local museum. Her son, Togoldor, age 4, is under the care of her mother-in-law and sister-in-law during the day. Handsuren has worked as a saleswoman in the local market for years. She is now starting her own clothing retail business in the market. She is requesting 3,000,000 MNT to import clothing inventory from Erlian, China, to sell to local customers. She is a hardworking and energetic person.

loans.use: to import clothing inventory from China to sell to local customers

loans.name: Beugue Ligueye Group

texts.fr:
Ils sont au nombre de cinq, dont quatre femmes et un homme qui habitent le même quartier. Ils ont appelé leur groupement : Beugue Ligueye. Ils  font du commerce et veulent diversifier leurs produits c’est pourquoi ils sont venus solliciter l’appui de l’IMCEC. 
La présidente, madame Rokhaya, âgée de 34 ans est mère d’une petite fille de 3 ans. Elle s’active dans  la vente de tissus et cela depuis 2 ans. Elle n’a pas de charges et son bénéfice est reversé dans l’activité. Avec le crédit, elle pourra aussi diversifier ses produits et satisfaire sa clientèle qui en demande toujours plus ; et de là, avoir sa propre autonomie financière.
texts.en:
There are five people in the group, four woman and one man, who live in the same neighborhood.The name of the group is Beugue Ligueye. They are in business and would like to diversify their products, which is why they are requesting a loan from IMCEC. 
The President, Mrs. Rokhaya is 34 years old and has one daughter who is three years old. She has been selling fabric for the past two years. She doesn't have expenses and all her profits are reinvested in the business. With the loan, she would like to diversify the products she sells and satisfy her client demands. This will give her more financial autonomy.

loans.use: to purchase fabric for resale.

loans.name: Rogelio

texts.en: Rogelio is from the city of Carmen Annex, Ozamis City. He is 26 years old. Rogelio is married with one child. To make a living, Rogelio provides cellphone repair services to local community members. Rogelio has been engaged in his business for over four years and earns approximately 7,000 PHP a month from these activities. In 2010, Rogelio joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services. He wanted to improve his living situation and increase his ability to engage in business activities. Rogelio is requesting a loan of 8,000 PHP, which will be used to expand the business. He plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of his family.

loans.use: To invest in expanding his cellphone repair service business

loans.name: Jonalyn

texts.en:
Jonalyn is 26 years old and married with one child. Jonalyn works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a loan of 12000 PHP through NWTF to purchase more items like rice, snack foods, frozen foods and other groceries.

Jonalyn has been in this business for six years and has previously received funds through Kiva.

Jonalyn aspires to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family home.

loans.use: to purchase more items like rice, snack foods, frozen foods and other groceries.

loans.name: Vicente

texts.en: Vicente is from the village of Cabungaan Clarin, Misamis Occidental. He is 42 years old. Vicente is married and has five adult children. To make a living, Vicente plants, harvests, and sells coconut. He has been engaged in his business for over ten years and earns approximately 7,500 PHP a month from these activities. In 2006, Vicente joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve his living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Vicente is requesting a new loan of 9,000 PHP which will be used to purchase fertilizers such as manure. He plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to pay for his children's tuition and for his family's daily needs.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizers such as manure

loans.name: Hilda Yolanda

texts.es: Hilda Yolanda vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos en casa propia; ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas, tiene varios años con el negocio y se ha hecho de experiencia muy valiosa que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, comercia desde su residencia y ya tiene mucha clientela pues las personas saben que todo lo que se prepara es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además con el mejor servicio  y el mas rápido; Hilda es una mujer activa entregada a su labor, lo que más desea en su vida es cumplir sus sueños, por eso trabaja con mucho esfuerzo sabe que así alcanzara el éxito; desde hace algún tiempo aumento la demanda y  no quiere decepcionar a sus clientes, es así como decidió aumentar la producción pero necesita de capital que le permita invertir en insumos, por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz, leña, etc. Hilda Yolanda tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, agrádese la colaboración y asegura que saldara la deuda y a la vez le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Hilda Yolanda lives with her life companion and children in their own house. She makes a living selling tortillas. She has had the business for various years, and she has grown from the very valuable experience which allows her to obtain better profits. She does her business from her home and already has many customers because the people know that all that she prepares is top quality and at accessible prices, and also with the best service and the fastest. Hilda is a very active woman, dedicated to her work. What she desires most in life is to complete her dreams, and for that reason she puts much effort into her work, because she knows that in that way she will reach success. For some time the demand has been rising, and she does not want to disappoint her customers. For that reason, she decided to increase her production, but she needs the capital to allow her to invest in supplies. For that reason, she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow her to buy corn, firewood, etc. Hilda Yolanda has good references of payment and is very responsible. She is thankful for the collaboration and assures that she will settle the debt and at the same time will give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn, firewood

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es: Jorge de 41 años de edad vive junto a su esposa y sus hijos, en casa propia. Gracias a Dios es un hombre que toda su vida ha sido trabajador y ha sido un buen padre ejemplar para sus hijos siendo un gran ejemplo para ellos. Jorge es responsable, atento, humilde pero con buenos deseos de superación su profesión es agricultor siendo esta una actividad económica que consiste en la cosecha de granos basicos como maiz y frjol. Es así como día a día se gana la vida honradamente y nunca ha faltado el  pan en su hogar el desea comprar de insumos agricolas como semillas, abonos, fertilizantes y pesticidas, es por eso que solicita a INTEGRAL un préstamo espera contar con la ayuda ya que ya casi no tienen animales y quiere seguirle brindando mejores condiciones de vida a su familia.
texts.en: Jorge is 41 years old and lives with his wife and children in their own home.  Thanks to God he has been a hard worker all of his life, and has been an exemplary father who is a good role model for his children.  Jorge is responsible, thoughtful and humble, but with a great desire to improve himself.  His occupation is farmer, an activity which consists of growing basic grains such as corn and beans.  This is how he earns his living honestly from day to day, and his household has never been without bread.  He would like to buy agricultural supplies such as seeds, manure, fertilizer and pesticides.  For this reason he is requesting a loan through INTEGRAL.  He hopes to receive help because they have almost no animals and he wants to continue providing better living conditions for his family.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies such as seeds, manure, fertilizer and pesticides.

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en: Jocelyn is from Segatic Daku, Clarin, Misamis Occidental. She is 50 years old. Jocelyn is married and has five school-aged children. Jocelyn owns and operates a dress shop (gowns for weddings, parties etc) and provides sewing services to her community. Jocelyn has been engaged in her business for over three years and earns approximately 14,500 PHP a month from these activities. In 2008, Jocelyn joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and her ability to engage in business activities. Jocelyn is requesting a new loan of 16,000 PHP which will be used to purchase materials needed to provide her sewing services. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase materials needed to provide sewing services.

loans.name: Edith Yolanda

texts.es: Edith de 28 años de edad y habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su grupo familiar su esposo y sus hijos. Ella se dedica  a la agricultura de granos básicos como maíz, frijol. Esta actividad la realiza  junto a su esposo y es así como logran llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar.  Edith es una mujer emprendedora, trabajadora  y responsable.  Siempre se ha  dedicado a la agricultura por lo que  conoce muy bien la manera de hacer esta activada. Cada año realiza esta actividad de la cual vende una parte de su cosecha y la otra la deja para consumo. Es así como poco a poco va saliendo adelante y dando a su familia el alimento básico. Edith desea incrementar mas sus venta y cosecha es por eso que ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en los insumos agrícolas como: semillas, abonos, insecticidas, etc. Y tambien para alquilar una parcela de tierra. Es así como  se gana la vida y lleva el pan de cada día a su hogar. Espera que  este año la cosecha sea favorable y logre cumplir su sueño
texts.en: Edith is 28 years old and lives in her own home with her family: her husband and their children.  She works in agriculture, growing basic grains such as corn and beans.  She does this work together with her husband, and this is how they put bread on the table every day in their home.  Edith is an enterprising, hardworking and responsible woman.  She has always worked in agriculture so she know very well how to do it.  Every year she sells part of her harvest and keeps the rest for consumption.  In this way, little by little, she gets by and provides her family with the necessities.  Edith would like to increase her harvest, and so she made the decision to request a loan through INTEGRAL to invest in agricultural supplies such as: seeds, manure, insecticides, etc.  She also wants to rent a plot of land.  This is how she earns a living and provides their daily bread to her household.  She hopes that the harvest will be good this year and she will achieve her dream.

loans.use: to invest in agricultural supplies such as: seeds, manure, insecticides, etc., and also to rent a plot of land.

loans.name: Maria Esperanza

texts.es: María Esperanza vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de productos Herbalife venden vitaminas y otros productos que ayudan a mantener una mejor nutrición, tiene varios años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, sus ventas llegan al máximo porque es un producto muy confiable, el negocio esta ubicado en su vivienda y también comercia de forma ambulante, es muy conocida por las personas del lugar, se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues todos saben que todo lo que comercia es de calidad, a precios accesibles y con un servicio inigualable siempre a la orden y al alcance de los clientes; María es una mujer emprendedora, dedicada a su labor y muy luchadora día con día se esfuerza al máximo para ganarse una vida mejor y un gran éxito para el futuro, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda y quiere aprovechar para una nueva inversión, pero no posee de suficiente capital que la respalde por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar productos Herbalife por mayor. María tiene buenas referencias de pago y una moral intachable se siente agradecida con la ayuda, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene la esperanza que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en: María Esperanza lives with her life companion and children. She makes a living selling Herbalife products (they sell vitamins and other products that help maintain better nutrition). She has had the business for a few years and it has given her much experience which allows her to obtain better products. Her sales are to the maximum because it is a very trustworthy product. The business is located in her home and she also sells by traveling to different neighborhoods. She is very well known by the locals, and she has many customers because they all know that everything she sells is good quality, at accessible prices, and with unequaled service within reach for her customers. María is very entrepreneurial, dedicated to her work and very persistent. Day by day she puts for the maximum effort to make a better life and achieve success in the future. In recent weeks she increased the demand and she wants to take advantage for a new investment, but she does not possess the sufficient capital to support her. For that reason, she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow her to buy Herbalife products in bulk. María has good payment references and impeccable morals. She is thankful for the help, and assures that she will be able to settle the debt and at the same time has the hope that she will bring economic security to her home.

loans.use: to buy Herbalife products in bulk

loans.name: Josue Daniel

texts.es: Josué Daniel vive junto a su compañera de vida en casa propia; el posee una venta de ropa para damas, caballeros y niños y adicional a eso para complementar los gastos del hogar vende calzado en toda talla, tiene mucho tiempo con el pequeño negocio y eso le ha regalado valiosa experiencia en las ventas lo que le ayuda a obtener las mejores ganancias; comercia desde  un lugar que califico como muy bueno para sus actividades comerciales, tiene mucha clientela que lo prefiere por la calidad del producto, los buenos precios y sobre todo por el excelente servicio; Josué es un hombre emprendedor, dedicado a su labor y con muchas ganas de salir adelante, siempre esta a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades que le permitan estar un paso mas cerca del éxito y no se rendirá hasta lograrlo por completo; en las ultimas semanas  aumento la demanda y quiere aprovechar para realizar una nueva inversión por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ropa por mayor. Josué Daniel tiene buenas referencias de pago y una moral intachable, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene fe que le dará a su familia una vida plena
texts.en:
Josué Daniel lives with his life partner in his own house; he has a business selling clothing for women, men, and children. Additionally, in order to supplement his household expenses, he sells footwear in all sizes. He’s had this small business for a long time, and it has given him valuable experience in sales, which helps him to get better earnings. 

He sells from a location that he describes as a very good for his business activities. He has many customers who prefer him because of the quality of his products, his good prices, and above all, for his excellent service.

Josué is an enterprising man, dedicated to his work and with a great desire to get ahead. He is always on the lookout for new opportunities that will allow him to get one step closer to success, and he will not give up until he achieves it in full. 

In recent weeks, his demand has increased, and he wants to take advantage of this in order to make a new investment. Therefore, he is requesting a loan from Integral that will allow him to purchase clothing in bulk. 

Josué Daniel has good payment references and faultless morals. He assures that he will be able to pay off the debt; at the same time, he will give his family a full life.

loans.use: to purchase wholesale clothing.

loans.name: Maria

texts.en: Maria is a married woman with seven children. Maria is 56 years old and is from Clarin, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. Maria owns and operates farmland, planting and harvesting corn for sale to earn a living. She's been eight years in this business. Each month, she earns 23,500 Philippines pesos (PHP) doing this work. She requested a loan of 25,500 PHP to purchase fertilizer such as manure. In 2008, Maria became a member of GDMPC. In the future, Maria wants to make improvements to her living situation.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer such as manure

loans.name: Edwin

texts.en: Edwin is 49 years old, married with four children. He lives in Clarin, Misamis Occidental. He owns and operates a business which harvests coconuts and produces copra for sale. He has had his business for over five years, and earns 17,500 PHP every month. He joined GDMPC in 2009, and now he has requested a loan of 19,000 PHP to purchase harvesting equipment. He dreams of making a better future for his children.

loans.use: to purchase harvesting equipment.

loans.name: Genalyn

texts.en: Genalyn is 42 years old, married with four children. She lives in Clarin, Misamis Occidental. She owns and operates a motorcycle transport business in the local community to earn a living. She has had her business for over nine years and earns 5,200 PHP every month. Genalyn joined GDMPC in 2008, and now she is requesting a loan of 6,000 PHP to repair an existing vehicle for better service. She hopes and dreams to improves her family's living situation.

loans.use: to repair an existing vehicle for better service.

loans.name: Liliana Beatriz

texts.es: Liliana habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su familia. Ella se dedica  a la agricultura de los principales granos básicos como son: maíz y frijol. Después de sacar la cosecha  comercializa una parte de su cultivo para poder suplir las necesidades de su hogar que cada día son mayores. Ella es una mujer muy emprendedora y admirable lo más importante en la vida es ganarse el pan de cada día dignamente con el trabajo de sus manos . Ha trabajado toda su vida en la agricultura y es así como ha logrado sobrevivir, puesto que no cuenta con otra fuente de ingresos diferente a la agricultura. Como toda mujer emprendedora y visionaria ha tomado la decisión de acercarse a esta institución ya que la fecha para empezar las siembras se aproximan y quiere estar preparada.  Es por esta razón que solicita este préstamo a INTEGRAL para invertir en la comprar de los insumos agrícolas como: semillas, insecticidas, abonos u  otros. Para comenzar la siembra lo más antes posible y poder cosechar los frutos de su esfuerzo. Confía plenamente que obtendrá una cosecha abundante la cual la cual le permitirá mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: Liliana lives in her own home with her family.  She works in agriculture, growing the main basic grains such as corn and beans.  After harvesting her crop she sells part of it to meet the needs of her household, which are greater every day.  She is a very hardworking and admirable woman, and the most important thing in her life is to earn her daily bread with dignity through her own labor.  She has worked in agriculture all of her life, and thus has managed to survive, given that she has no other source of income besides agriculture.  As a enterprising and visionary woman she made the decision to approach this organization as the date to begin planting crops is approaching and she wants to be prepared.  For this reason she is requesting a loan through INTEGRAL to buy agricultural supplies such as: seeds, insecticides, fertilizer and others, in order to begin planting as soon as possible and to be able to harvest the fruits of her labor.  She trusts completely that she will obtain an abundant harvest that will allow her to improve the quality of life for her family.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies such as: seeds, insecticides, manure and others.

loans.name: Zenaida

texts.en:
Zenaida is 53 years old and married with one child. She lives Aurora, Zamboanga Del Sur. 

Zenaida owns and operates a retail business: which is making charcoal for sale to earn a living. She  has been with her business over 15 years and earns  38,500PHP each month. She is a new member of GDMPC, and now she is requesting a loan of 40,000PHP to purchase additional coconut shells and to invest in renovating the business. She plans to use the additional revenue generated to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional coconut shells and to invest in renovating the business.

loans.name: Marnilita

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Marnilita works hard to support her family.

She has a general store business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from raising pigs. Marnilita is borrowing PHP 25000 through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell.

Marnilita has been sustaining her business activities through her past 23 loans from NWTF and more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Editha

texts.en: Editha is 37 years old, married and has three children, who she sends to school. To gain income, she raise chickens and sell them upon maturity. She has been in her business for about four years now. She would like to keep raising healthy chickens, that is why she needs for additional capital in sustaining their needs for feed and vaccines. She is asking for PHP10,000 to buy feed and vaccines for chickens. It will help them grow heavier and she could sell them at a profitable price. Someday, with good funds, she hopes to keep sustaining all her children's needs for good education.

loans.use: to buy feed and vaccines for chickens.

loans.name: Luz Marixa

texts.es: Luz de 35 años de edad y habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su grupo familiar. Ella se dedica  a la agricultura de granos básicos como maíz, frijol. Esta actividad la realiza  desde hace tiempo y es así como logran llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar.  Luz es una mujer emprendedora, trabajadora  y responsable.  Siempre se ha  dedicado a la agricultura por lo que  conoce muy bien la manera de hacer esta activada. Cada año realiza esta actividad de la cual vende una parte de su cosecha y la otra la deja para consumo. Es así como poco a poco va saliendo adelante y dando a su familia el alimento básico. Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en los insumos agrícolas como: semillas, abonos, insecticidas, etc. Es así como  se gana la vida y lleva el pan de cada día a su hogar. Espera que  este año la cosecha sea favorable y logre cumplir su sueño.
texts.en:
Luz is 35 years old and lives in her own house together with her family members. She works in agriculture with basic grains like corn and beans. She has been doing this work for some time, and it’s in this way that she brings in the daily bread to her home. 

Luz is an enterprising, hardworking, and responsible woman. She has always worked in agriculture; therefore, she knows how to do this work very well. 

Every year, she does this work from which she sells a part of her harvest. She saves the other part to eat. Little by little, in this way she gets ahead and gives her family their basic nutrition. 

She has made the decision to request this loan in order to invest in agricultural supplies such as: seeds, fertilizer, insecticides, etc. In this way, she earns a living and puts bread on her table every day. She hopes that this year, the harvest will be favorable and she will succeed in fulfilling her dreams.

loans.use: to invest in agricultural supplies like: seeds, fertilizer, insecticides, etc.

loans.name: Merlyn

texts.en:
Merlyn is 53 years old and married. She is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Merlyn requested a loan of 25000 PHP through NWTF to purchase medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

Merlyn has been raising pigs for 15 years now, and has borrowed 24 times in the past from NWTF and more recently, from Kiva to sustain her business.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

loans.name: Lilia

texts.en:
Lilia is a 43-year-old married woman and a mother of six children. They live in Bohol, Philippines. Lilia is engaged in the motorcycle transport business. She is also engaged in a mat weaving business.
Lilia is asking for a loan to buy materials such as romblon or reed plants and straw for mat weaving. Lilia hopes to make her business a success. Moreover, she wants to augment her income so that she can support the needs of her family and repay her loan.

loans.use: to buy materials for mat weaving like romblon and straw.

loans.name: Loida

texts.en: Loida earns a living through her sari-sari or variety store business. She operates it in Bohol, Philippines. The 34-year-old mother of two has been in the business for more than five years. Loida dreams of expanding her current store but she lacks the financial means to do so. She is asking for a loan from CEVI to buy additional stocks to sell like rice, sugar, soda, beverages, bread and snack foods, cooking ingredients and seasoning, soap and toiletries. With this, she will be able to attract and cater for more buyers in her store thus augmenting her sales and profit. Loida hopes to make her business a success and to save money for the future schooling of her children.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks to sell like rice, sugar, soda, beverages, bread and snack foods, cooking ingredients and seasoning, soap and toiletries.

loans.name: Shamsa

texts.en:
Shamsa is 36 years old and has four children, all of whom are schooling. She is from Msambweni, a coastal town in Kenya. She is the owner of a store that sells various types of clothing. The store is in a nearby trading center, and she has worked there for the past five years.

She is a very hard-working person who, thanks to her efforts, is getting ahead and helping her family, day by day. She tells us that things are very difficult, but in spite of that, she makes an effort to move forward. The major challenge she faces is stiff competition from other sellers of clothing, but because of her good relationships with customers she has been able to overcome that. She has been able to gain a wide range of customers, therefore she needs to expand her business to satisfy her customers' needs and buy different clothes bundles.

loans.use: to expand her business and buy different clothes bundles.

loans.name: Dzame

texts.en:
Dzame is 42 years old and lives with her husband and their three children in a rental house. She has a cereal store and also sells to the local residents in their homes. She has been doing this for the last four years. She has gained lots of experience that has allowed her to maximize her profits. The business is in a small shopping center near where she lives and she is very well known because she has many customers due to the quality, good prices, and her excellent relationship with customers.

She is well known due to her friendliness, honesty, and because she is completely dedicated to her work. She is enterprising and has a great desire to get ahead. The demand for her goods has increased in recent weeks and she wants to take advantage of it and make a new investment so that she can comfortably serve her customers. She is therefore requesting a loan through Yehu Microfinance to buy sacks of maize, beans, and peas. She has a good repayment history and is very responsible. She is confident she will be able to get out of debt and will bring financial security to her home.

loans.use: to buy sacks of maize, beans, and peas.

loans.name: Damaris

texts.en:
Damaris is 35 years old, married with two children, and resides in Tiribe, Kenya with her family. She is very hard-working and she has the desire to always achieve and progress in her business. She is always setting a good example at home, as every morning she wakes up with new dreams and desires for prospering. 

She owns food stall, which is her source of living. She prepares and sells basic food such as milk, eggs, tea, porridge,and fish, among other things. She started the business four years ago and has a good customer base because customers like her way of being and of attending to them. She is very happy because every day she is doing well.

She is approaching Yehu for a loan amounting to 30000 KES to buy wheat flour, sugar, tea leaves, and cooking oil at wholesale prices. She is grateful for the opportunity.

For some time Damaris has wanted to expand her only source of work and to have the shop a little better stocked.

loans.use: to buy wheat flour, sugar, tea leaves, and cooking oil.

loans.name: Anthony

texts.en: Anthony is a hardworking man who is applying for a loan of 40,000 KES as a subsequent loan to expand to another business. He wants to establish a new business of cloth selling, so he will use the loan to buy bundles of clothes.

loans.use: to buy bundles of clothes.

loans.name: Margaret

texts.en: Margaret is requesting a loan amounting to Ksh.50,000 as a subsequent loan. This is after success with little difficulties. She is very grateful that she got the opportunity which helped her to establish her business.She is now planning to venture into a new area of business selling coconuts so as to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy sacks of coconuts  for sale

loans.name: Ester Noemy

texts.es: Ester Nohemy  vive junto a su compañero de vida en casa propia; ella posee una venta de ropa para damas, caballeros y niños, ropa muy novedosa y al gusto de los clientes, se ha hecho de mucha experiencia en las ventas y eso le ayuda a obtener las mejores ganancias; comercia desde un lugar que califico como excelente para sus actividades comerciales, ya tiene mucha clientela que la prefiere por la calidad del producto, los buenos precios y sobre todo por el excelente servicio; Ester es una mujer emprendedora, dedicada a su labor y con muchas ganas de salir adelante, siempre esta a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades que le permitan estar un paso mas cerca del éxito y de su competencia, no se rendirá frente a ningún obstáculo; en las ultimas semanas  aumento la demanda y quiere aprovechar para realizar una nueva inversión por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ropa por mayor. Ester Nohemy tiene buenas referencias de pago y una moral intachable, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene confianza que le dará a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
Ester Nohemy lives with her partner in their own house.  She has a clothing shop for women, men, and children.  Her clothes are very fashionable and popular with her customers due to her extensive experience in retail, which helps her obtain the best profits.  

She sells at a location that she considers excellent for her needs and where she has many customers that prefer her due to the quality of her products, good prices, and, more than anything, for her excellent service.

Ester is a very enterprising woman, is dedicated to her work and wants very much to get ahead.  She always looks out for new opportunities that might permit her to get one step closer to success and to her competition.  She won't give up when faced with any obstacle.

In recent weeks, demand has increased and she wants to take advantage of it in order to make a new investment.  For this reason, she is asking INTEGRAL for a loan to allow her to buy clothes wholesale.  

Ester Nohemy has good payment references and impeccable morals.  She guarantees that she will be able to pay back her debt and at the same time has confidence that it will give her family a full life.

loans.use: purchase wholesale clothes

loans.name: Rene

texts.es: Rene de 47 años de edad habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su esposa  y su hijos . Él se dedica a la agricultura desde hace muchos años cultiva granos básicos como maíz, y frijol. Dicha actividad la repite año con año ya que es su principal fuente de ingresos. De esta forma es como se gana la vida y lleva el pan de cada día a su hogar. Su sueño es mejorar  su calidad de vida  y la de su familia siempre ha deseado darles algo diferente.  Esto lo motiva a trabajar con más entusiasmo ya que solo con el trabajo logrará dar a su familia lo que tanto desea. Es por estas razones que ha tomado la decisión de acercarse  a esta institución, INTEGRAL,  para solicitar este crédito que le permita invertir en los insumos agrícolas como: semillas, abonos, insecticidas, u otros. Espera lograr su objetivo de dar a su familia lo que se merece y poder accesar a una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Rene is 47 years old and lives in a house with his wife and children.  He has worked in farming for many years growing staple grains such as corn and beans.  He repeats this year after year since it is their main source of income.  In this way, he earns a living and provides daily bread to his household.
